Brief Description of sighting: A large UFO, with all different colour of lights around it. Was stationary for some time, then started moving, making small erratic movements.
An object that is continually changing colour. Normal star shape.
An oval, cigar shaped object. When the object speeded up, the witness could see red and white lights around or underneath it.
There were circular lights that were indistinct. The object was continually orbiting and tilting.
One, North Star sized object. Red and green colours, brighter than a star. Was moving from West to North.
One star shaped object. It had white, red and green flickering lights. It was very high and moving very slowly.
One object, larger than a light plane. Was circular and greenish in colour. Moved faster than a plane and then appeared to fall to the ground.
Two bright white lights and three green lights in a row, with a red light beneath, seen hovering above a field.
Huge lights, like a child's sparkler, round, and as big as a house. There was no sound.
One, star shaped object. It was multicoloured. The object was stationary for over two hours.
There was an orange glow in the sky. Small plane sized, cigar shaped object. It descended quickly.
Five lights were seen in the sky. They then formed into two dashes. One moved off, and then they all disappeared.
Two white lights that were oblong shaped, and very bright. They were heading in every direction.
Three lights in a triangular formation. The lights split up and then proceeded in three separate directions, at the speed of the car.
A triangle of three stars. One was stationary and the other two were moving at the speed of a plane. They were brilliant white.
Five, round shaped flashing lights. Red and white in colour. They separated and went in different directions.
Intermittent light was flashing red. Then two flying objects were seen.
Two objects/lights that were parallel. Were stationary for about 10 seconds. They moved away at speed, and then became brighter.
A green light seen in the sky, that moved in a curve, falling as it went.
Three triangular shaped objects. They were bright white, but also turned red, green and orange. They moved spot and then zoomed off.
A huge, blue, fast object in the sky. There was a cloud of smoke and it made the floor shake.
A round, glowing object, with a dome on top and another underneath. It had port holes and glowed white/yellow. Disappeared after a few seconds.
One large, semi-circular shaped object. Blood red orange, very vivid. Similar to a street light. Object was stationary, then moved off.
Three very bright objects, pulsating - white, green and yellow. They sometimes moved into a triangular formation.
One object. Was bright red/orange in colour. Bright light. The object was moving downwards.
One object. Got larger as it came close. Was starlight shaped, with a blue light pulsating and was extremely bright.
One bright object. Collection of red, green and blue lights.
One object, in the shape of three dots. Flashing red, purple, blue and yellow lights. They looked like disco lights.
One object, 50 metres across. Was round and dark, with white incandescent lights around it. With two very bright, red lights beneath it.
One, silver/white metallic object. Stubby wings further back. Cylindrical. Low, growling hum. Two more objects were there for 2-3 minutes.
Two blue lights. Shape described as a flint sparking continuously. Both lights varied from being 30-100 yards apart.
A 'tube of light' coming down from the sky. It first looked like a star moving towards the car. Left a dust cover on the car.
Three white lights accompanied by a red light. They seemed to be many miles away.
One sphere shaped object. White light. It descended slowly to eye level and slowed and appeared to spin and accelerate and then disappeared.
Two to three UFOs circling the area. They looked like fast moving, cloud shaped objects.
Orange, round object that was very bright. Was high up and made a rapid downwards descent.
Mirror like object. It was flickering.
Cigar shaped object, with wings but no tail. Jade green in colour. White lights through windows. Moved in a straight line.
One large, triangular shaped object. Very bright, and white in colour and green at the top. It was moving North.
An oval shaped object, moving very fast.
One object that was spherical shaped. It was silver in colour and very shiny and bright. It remained steady and then disappeared.
Disc shaped objects were seen. They were surrounded by lights. A Droning noise was heard. One shot off, but returned later with another identical object.
One object, like a vapour trail, (but too low down). White, but not bright. Not very fast.
Two strange, white lights surrouned by coloured lights. Then two more lots of lights appeared. They were moving slowly towards London.
One object, round shaped, consisting of a large, bright light. It was moving from East to West.
The object was spherical in shape. Was a solid blue colour in the centre. It was moving in a Westerly direction.
A very bright meteorite or space debris.
A round, deep, red object. It was not lit up and didn't have any lights. It was moving from West to East and was very high. 4-5 times faster than an airliner.
One oblong object. It was red in the centre and had up to fifteen lights. There was constant movement.
Two objects that had one blue and one orange light. They were very bright. They were stationary and then there was erratic movement.
Two, small, triangular shaped objects. Black in colour. The objects were heading North and then disappeared into cloud.
One airship shaped object. It was black. It was drifting smoothly.
One, triangular shaped object. A shiny, golden colour. It was moving in a straight line and was fast.
The object was believed to have landed on top of the Westbury White Horse Beauty Spot in Wiltshire.
There was a cream coloured light.
Five round, glowing objects. They were moving up and down and side to side, and were quite fast.
One, very large, oblong shaped object.Yellowy/blue in colour. The object was stationary.
One object, green in colour and about 200 feet in the air. It had a very, long, green tail behind it.
White light, not unlike A/C landing light, with a faint beam or trail. Was stationary and then there was some movement.
Triangular shaped object. It was green/yellow in colour and had pulsing lights. It made rapid, jerky movements and moved position.
One object, similar to aircraft size, but triangular shaped. It was light in the centre, but the rest was dim white. Moved left/right, and stop/started.
A pink/red, round object. A bit came off the side and fell down. The object was flying in a North Westerly direction.
The object was at an angle. It was round with a dome on top. It had lights all around and internal lights. It was stationary and then hovered.
One object, car headlight size. Was white and very bright.
The object was like a star with a tail. There was a glow all around it. It was stationary.
Two objects. One was solid and charcoal grey and the other was more like a bright light. They zig zagged and then moved away vertically.
A metallic blue object. It hovered above the sea, and then crashed into it.
A round ball with a tail. Was like a torch with a flare. There was no movement.
One object with white and red lights.
One, round, very bright object, with static beams shining down.
Five, pure white lights. They were very fast, and went from horizon to horizon in two-three seconds.
One huge big circle of bright white light. Was high in the sky and was circling around.
One, large, oval, white and very bright object. The object was straight and level and was moving parallel with the car.
Three lights. Then there was a blue flash about 500ft up.
One large, triangle shaped object. Lit up blue. 200 ft in length. A very bright light in each corner. Hovered, then shot off. Left a substance of which he has some in a jam jar.
A small object that was moving very strangely.
One, large, cigar shaped object, with four individual red/green lights. Very bright. Was moving very slowly and moving from left to right.
One large, round, white object. It was larger than aircraft lights. Very bright.
Saucer shaped object, like a dull grey cloud. It was moving slowly, but faster than a cloud.
A peculiar object, that looked like a flock of birds, with a hole in the middle, leaving a vapour trail across the sky. Had orange lights around it.
Two objects were side by side. They were white and very bright. During the incident, the car radio was producing static.
Two, very large, round objects. Larger than aircraft lights. White and very bright. They were in line with each other. Were moving Northwards.
One object. Dark black and a triangular shape. Small red light on the nose. Two white lights on the edges that were flashing.
A triangular object. Was hovering off of the coast.
Three objects (lights), that were orange/red in colour. Were 500 yards apart of each other. They were moving from left to right.
The object was a similar size and shape as a star. Blue and white in colour. It occasionally changed to red. It twinkled.
Lights in the sky, which were white, then green, red and blue. Was stationary and then moved from left to right.
One jumbo sized, missile shaped object. Very long. Had fins at rear. White, with an amber glow at the rear. Engine noise. Straight and level.
An object with pieces of fire coming off of it. It was moving fast through the sky, and the witness thought that it may crash.
One, round object. Very bright. It was slow.
An orange blob, with a long fiery trail from the top, and twenty times longer than wide. Like a hot air balloon coming down, leaving a trail.
One star shaped object. White and bright. Travelling in a direct line and was exceptionally fast.
An object was moving in 90 degree angles. It sped up and then slowed down.
One object, like a dot of light. White and fairly bright. Was vertical. Moved very fast.
A circular ball of light, which changed to green and then red in colour. It travelled horizontally across the sky.
A bright, white light, which had a circle of lights and a triangle in the middle, and also, three large, mauve/blue spots. It hovered, then shot off to the West.
Three objects, green in colour. Horizontal - and approximately the size of traffic lights. Were steady and going from West to East.
A sequence of flashing lights, which changed colour - red, blue, green and white.
Bright light which was green. It had a purple haze. It moved in a straight line and was low in the sky and slow. Very quiet.
A saucer shaped object. Had red and blue lights on it. It was hovering silently, and then disappeared behind trees.
Two, small disc shaped, bright silver objects. Steady movement and level elevation.
A dish shaped, very shiny metallic object. 15-20 metres in diameter. 5-6 metres deep. It moved slowly and then sped off.
One, round shaped object. Very bright. It was white in colour, then turned to a red dot and sped off.
There were two identically sized crafts. Extremely bright and both an obscured shape. They oscillated in an eliptical pattern.
One, bell shaped object. It had one red light and one bright, white light. It was moving across the sky from West to East.
One triangular shaped object. It was light yellow at the front and the rest was black. It moved sideways then stopped. It disappeared at speed.
One object that was saucer shaped. Was white/orange in colour and very bright.
One object, like a star, but larger. Star coloured and very bright. It was moving very fast.
Two round, white lights. They were performing circles.
Red, white and blue lights in a triangle shape, were flying across the sky.
An unidentified flying object was seen.
Two-five disc like objects. Green on left and yellow on the right. They were bright. Were moving, dropping and then re-appearing in the sky.
A very large, grey object, with red, blue and green lights. There was a very loud humming noise. It came lower and nearer to the witness.
Two objects. The first one was disk shaped and the second one was cigar shaped. Both were black. They were slow moving.
A bright object rose from a roof top vertically, to a great height. It was a flat elongated shape and appeared to be grey inside.
One round object with lights. There was one medium constant light.There was an unusual noise. It made erratic jerky movements.
One round object, 15 ft in diameter. Was emitting 7 or 8 green lights downwards. Quite bright. There was steady movement.
One object, the size of the North Star. Round and orange and yellow in colour. Quite bright. Was stationary and then there was steady movement.
One round shaped object. Green in colour and was very bright. It was very fast.
Diamond shaped object. Yellow and white in colour and was flashing. It was darting around the sky.
One, triangular shaped object. The size of a small light aircraft. Was very bright. It made a sort of a buzzing noise. The object followed the witness.
One cube shaped object. Was the size of a micro light aircraft. Was black in colour. It moved straight across the sky.
One very large star, with a slight beam, twinkled all different colours. It hovered back and forth for about 1 and a half hours.
Cylindrical object. Was slow moving.
15-20, tail shaped objects, making snaking movements like a tail on a kids kite across the sky. They were orange and very bright.
One round shaped object, double the size of a star. White (pale), but very bright. It was stationary for a while and then travelled straight and level.
Blue flashing lights with no shape. There was a strange noise that woke the witness. The flight was straight and the lights were moving North.
One large, triangular shaped object. Black in colour. Was moving to the West.
A brilliant white light, travelling at alternating speeds. It disappeared and then minutes later, the same light came from an egg shaped object, that was hovering.
One round object. Yellow in colour, bright and shimmering. It was moving from left to right.
10-20 lights in the sky. The objects were flashing red, orange and green like traffic lights. They were stationary and silent.
One short object, like an aircraft and trail. Was white and very bright. Stationary, then moved to the North from the South. It disappeared instantly.
Large object, helmet shaped. Had bright, white lights on the underside, and was completely silent. Was moving slowly and then sped off.
One object, with one light on the front. About 450 ft up. It moved West and picked up speed.
One large, star like object. White in colour. Was moving slow from North to South.
A ball of white light slowly moving across the sky. Through binoculars, there was a white globe of light.
An intense white, flashing light. It was drifting slowly overhead due West.
A bright star like shaped object, changing into an eliptical shape. It was rising slowly.
A big red dome with a bright red light. There were then white lights. It moved in a straight line.
A solid round ball - approximately 100 ft in diameter. It changed colour from dark red to black. A beam of light came from the object on to the witness.
A small intense ball of light. White in colour. It was travelling in a straight line and then made erratic movements and moved East.
A circular object, with four of five lights around the perimeter. It travelled slowly to the North.
A round, black object was travelling across the sky at speed. There appeared to be something draping from the bottom.
Numerous, ball shaped, white lights. They were very bright. They were high in the sky, rapid, moving horizontal and round and round and up and down.
Two, round shaped objects. One had a white, steady light, and the other had a flashing white light. Both very bright. They moved South East.
A solid white line.
One cylindrical/cigar shaped object. Was bright white. It made a rocket noise and was very loud. Very close, was horizontal and moved very fast.
One object, that looked like a saucer shape and then a comet with a tail. It was very bright orange and shining.
A cigar shaped object was travelling from North to South. It was silver/blue in colour. It was about 20,000 ft up.
A long cylindrical shaped object. Was silvery white in colour and extremely bright.
A long, cigar/oval shaped object. It was a dark grey/silver colour, when moving. When stationary, the silver colour became bright.
One large, house sized, rugby ball shaped object. Was grey and black in colour. There were lights on it, in a triangle shape.
There were five lights in a star shape, at an angle of 20 degrees, which were rotating and changing colour. The lights also appeared to pulsate.
A man/alien walked in and layed on the witnesses quilt, then whooshed through the window.
Lights were seen over the Isle of Wight.
A big ball of white light was moving in a South Westerly direction. It then disappeared into nothing.
One small plane sized, round shaped object. It was black (tar), in colour. It was stationary and then shot directly upwards in the sky.
A group of about twelve white lights. They were moving West. They were fast.
One, then many objects, that were brighter than a normal star. They were elongated and had white flashing lights. Were very bright.
One object that was balloon shaped. Was orange in colour and moving low in the sky.
Solid, silver objects seen below cloud level.
A metallic object was seen. A blue, green and yellow light came from it. It was very bright.
A circular shaped object, with 4 - 5 lights on it's perimeter. It travelled in a Northerly direction.
A UFO was seen. It was 100 ft high in the sky. It was a circular shape and had three lights on it. It moved quite slowly.
One round, very bright object. It was moving from East to West and going very fast.
One object, the size of a small civil airliner. It was moving to the East. Looked like the object took a sidestep to the right.
One object, the shape of a star and the brightness of a star. It moved fast, and then stopped and then sped off.
The object was oblong shaped and had lights. It moved too fast for an aircraft.
One very large object. It was orange/yellow in colour and very bright. It shot up into the sky.
Three extremely bright lights, that then moved to form a huge triangle. The lights were of a similar brightness to a welding torch.
One barbeque shaped object. Had green and white still lights on it. Was very low, about a house and a half away.
Segments of pale blue lights in a circle. It was stationary, then lights vanished and reappeared again.
One object, that appeared to be triangular or diamond shaped. Orange in colour and very dull. Was circling and moved away quickly and disappeared.
A vague shape of an aircraft getting bigger. Looked like a light too. It got closer, then stopped, then started moving again.
Two triangular shaped lights, one above the other could be seen.
There were two UFOs travelling at some speed. They looked like two bright discs.
Two bright lights were seen at 5000 ft. They were stationary for a short time and then they disappeared.
Green balloons, that looked a bit like hot air balloons. They were quite bright. Were travelling East and at the speed of a helicopter.
One large, oval shaped object. It had 12 white lights surrounding it. Very bright. It moved very fast.
Seven orange zig zags of light in the sky. They moved very fast in a zig zag formation and whooshed into clouds and disappeared.
Fourteen objects, some red, some white, at different stages. Nine more in a triangular shape. There were different sounds coming from the objects.
A triangular object. Had multicoloured flashing lights. It hovered and then shot off in an Easterly direction at high speed.
One black, balloon shaped object. It was small, but high up in the sky. Was climbing and travelling Northwest and was moving very fast.
A large, round object, as big as a house. It had a cluster of lights within it. It was pulsating left and right, as if on a pivot.
Object was a round shape. It appeared to be static. Was black in colour and there were no lights visible.
One, triangular shaped object. Height of object was about 2000 ft. Object travelled slowly, hovered and then changed direction sharply.
A bright, star shaped object. It had sparkling red, green, blue and white lights. It made erratic movements and slowly moved to the South.
A long silver rod, with a red box at the rear. Was very bright. Was moving in a straight line.
A bright light. It wasn't moving.
One object, with four lights. All yellow/orange in colour. It moved to the North, then turned to it's original position, then disappeared.
A bright orange ball with a tail. Was high in the sky and was stationary.
A round light, the size of a five pence piece through binoculars. Was moving East.
One light with three flashing lights on the side. It moved around erratically.
An orange, disc like object. It disappeared at high speed.
A bright, white light that was comet shaped with a tail. There was a red glow on the forked tail. It was moving towards the horizon.
One object, the size and round shape of a Met balloon. It was a dark colour, but had an orange glow behind it. Was stationary and then climbed vertically.
White lights, with five or six flashing. They changed shape. They were round and very bright and disappeared and reappeared.
There was a vertical orange line in the sky. It varied in thickness and at the bottom, was an orange ball.
There were two orange objects. Two red lights were also seen. Directly behind it, was a cigar shaped object.
Two objects. Orange, green and red colours. The object was flashing. It was static.
One object. It had two wings, but no fuselage. Was black in colour. Was heading in a North Easterly direction.
Two, possibly three lights. Sometimes looked like fireworks or stars. All fairly bright. The lights were going round in tiny little circles.
One, disc/jaffa cake shaped object. Was silver in colour. Was moving smoothly in a South Easterly direction.
An enormous tube in the sky, perhaps half a mile long and quarter of a mile wide. The shape was made up of a mass of small dots.
A small, spherical object. It changed colour from yellow to white. Was fast moving and made a 'fizzing' sound, like a small meteorite.
Two large, triangular shaped objects. There was a multitude of lights that were large and changing pattern. One object came vertically down and hovered.
Two objects. They were white and green in colour, and made a booming noise. They were moving from West to East and faster than a plane.
Two white lights in parallel. They were stationary.
One, circular shaped object. The top was shining, but the bottom was dark. Was moving from North to South.
One airborne craft, very high. Was white in colour and bright. It was flying straight and level from East to West.
One cigar shaped object. Had one bright light. The object was moving South.
A slow moving disc shaped object. It was wavering. It then disappeared into cloud cover.
One large, cigar shaped object. There were three lights at the front of the shape. White in colour and very bright. Moved up and across and was slow moving.
Two orange, circular shaped objects. Like a tennis ball at arms length. They were at a low angle and were stationary.
A rectangular shaped object of shiny metal. Bright white too. It appeared to be dropping, then disappeared below the horizon out of sight.
Orange diffused light. Was slow moving.
A semi circular object, made up of four or five circular lights constantly illuminated. A red light appeared to revolve around the semi circular shape.
One circular shaped object, smaller than the moon. Was orange and very bright. It was moving due South.
One object, larger than an aircraft. Very bright light which was like a 'V' shape. 7-8 lights each side. Was moving to the North West.
An object, which had green, blue, red and silver lights. Lights were not flashing. The lights went off and a large gold coloured light came on for a few seconds.
A misty sphere. It was silvery grey in colour. Four or five stars looked linked to it. It was stationary at first and then started to hover.
A small, well defined light. It was moving from the West to the East.
Nine to twelve, round white lights. They were moving rapidly and appeared to collide.
A silver, cigar shaped object. It had sharp pointed wings, with a red light on one side, and one green light on the other. It hovered at first and then moved off quickly.
One, round shaped object. Was white and red in colour. The object was stationary.
One round shaped object. It was flashing green, blue and yellow. It was seen due North.
One object, that was white in the centre. It had a faint brightness. It moved due North and then was stationary.
One blue, white and grey object. Was a big swirl like a dust storm, then a circle within a circle, like a gas ring. The centre was transparent then changed into a straight line.
Looked like a laser beam in the sky. The witness followed the light for about 10 miles in the car.
One square shaped object. It had lots of lights. Fifty or possibly more. They were very bright. The object flashed on and off.
A round disc, about the size of a fighter jet. Was travelling at 300mph at approx. 1000ft. The object had no wings and made no sound. Was moving South East.
One weird shaped object. Like a circle with a rectangle on it and two prongs coming off the circle. Was white and very bright.
One object, shaped like a cottage loaf. It had a mass of red lights. One large one in the middle was pulsating. Sounded like a helicopter. Not fast, very steady.
An object. It had silver, red, green, yellow and mauve lights that were spinning and flashing. Very bright. It then suddenly vanished.
A straight line that was grey. It had no wings. It was moving Southwards.
A silver disc. It was very shiny. It came out of a corn field vertically and then disappeared.
A very bright light, that was round and had a flat bottom. It was stationary at first and then started to move slowly to the South.
There were three lights, two were quite dim and the third was quite bright. The two dim lights moved off in another direction.
One object, the size of a small car. Looked like an upside down plate. Was white and very bright. Was stationary for a few minutes, then disappeared.
A UFO. Similar to a conventional aircraft. Travelling Northwards at huge speed.
A large, light object with lights on it. Was making an unusual sound. Something shot out of it, as the witness was looking at it. It hovered outside the bedroom window and
Two UFOs. Both were white and were very dim. They were moving West, and making erratic movements.
A massive UFO. It broke up into two parts, that looked like fire balls. There was broken movement.
A football shaped object. It had a very bright light. Left a trail behind it, as it skimmed across the sky. It then disappeared.
One, round shaped object. It was white and bright. It was as bright as the moon, but with a halo too. It moved from East to West.
Two saucer shaped objects, and both had a dome on top. Both were the width of a large dog. Illuminous green. They were flying around and chasing each other. Trees were
Four circular/eliptical shaped objects. They were smaller than a normal aeroplane. They were white and very bright.
One object, that was cigar shaped with a bobble centrally above and below. It glowed white very brightly, with a constant light. Moved very fast vertically into the cloud.
A huge UFO. Part of it came down in the woods near Bexley.
Two independent bright, white lights. Both lights were moving fast and were heading North.
One rectangular shaped object. It had three bright lights, and a red light at the rear. It lifted straight up.
One object which was diamond shaped. Was black in colour with green edges. It was high in the sky, about 700ft, and moving at a very fast speed.
There was a burning light going across the sky. It was like a fireball and vapourised after about 10-15 seconds.
A bright orange sphere. In the centre, it was paler. Half moon shaped wings. The object descended rapidly, moved across the horizon and then suddenly disappeared.
A circular ball of white light. It was the brightness of a star. It was silent. It dropped down very fast and then blinked out.
One large, very bright, white light. It was followed by a smaller white light. They were moving North East.
One large bright light, which was then followed by a smaller light. It moved from the South West to East.
One large white light, followed by a smaller light. It came from a Westerly direction.
One object shaped like a horizontal cylinder. It was aircraft size. Was white in colour and very bright. It was hovering.
A very bright star. The star came towards the witness, lit up the whole area and then went back in the direction it had come from.
A large, saucer shaped object. It was the size of a hot air balloon, with two pods on either side and a central bright light/firey glow.
A pair of stars appeared to be moving in an Easterly direction. They moved almost in a straight line.
A circular object that was spinning and glinting. It was moving from East to West very fast.
One bright, white light in the sky.
One object that was a greenish colour. It then turned red and was very bright. There was erratic movement. It moved very quickly backwards and forwards creating a 'W'
One object, that was bigger than a car. It was white and very bright. It came down the road.
Two objects, both the size of a saloon car. Both were very bright. They were bouncing about all over the sky.
Two lights in the sky. They were yellow/orange in colour. They moved in various directions - straight lines and curved lines and definite turns.
A bright circular light. It was stationary for 40 minutes, and then it started to move slowly.
Twenty five to thirty small metallic objects. The objects were very high and moving very fast.
One object. Yellow and red in colour. It was stationary and then made erratic movements. It was going backwards, up and down and kept changing speed.
Three objects. They looked round. They were white and all as bright as a star. The objects moved from East to West and back to East again.
One, star like shaped object. It had a bright, white light. Brighter than any star. The object moved to the right and then upwards.
Two objects, which were star shaped. Looked like a metal colour. They were drifting across the sky.
A bright light in the sky. It disappeared quickly, leaving a glow behind.
One object. Was angular. It was moving Eastwards and was rising in the sky.
Two fighter jet sized objects. Looked a bit like normal aircraft. They were pale and glowing pink. Were moving from West to East very fast.
One bright yellow light. It looked similar to a street lamp. It rose and kept rising, until it disappeared into a black hole in the sky.
There was a white dancing light, within some red and green lights, in a triangular shaped object. It was roughly stationary with some horizontal movement.
A luminous, triangular shaped object that was hovering in the sky. There were four other luminous objects flying near it. The first object, then disappeared.
One object, white and very bright. Was about 10ft above the ground. It circled the witness twice and then disappeared.
One shooting star. It zig-zagged across the sky, and then it disappeared.
An object, much bigger than a star. Looked like a large apple. It exploded and sparkled like a firework and then fizzled out.
A white flash in the sky, repeating about every five minutes, about four times. It got brighter and then the last time, it looked like a very bright ball in the sky.
An object, the size of a golf ball was seen at 3-4000ft. It was very bright and yellow in colour. It moved over the witnesses house at high speed.
One large, round object. Was white and very bright. It was moving from right to left and then back again, quickly. There was a low humming noise.
A triangular shaped object. It had two red lights on the rear. On the front was a white light, but it didn't give off a beam of light. A second object joined it and they moved off at
Object looked triangular and moved in a manner similar to a 'jelly fish'. It was moved in an Easterly direction.
A small triangular shaped object. It had black wings, and was sausage shaped in the middle. It was moving very fast.
A black, disk shaped object. It was low in the sky and was pulsating. It was moving in a straight line and then climbed vertically.
One large, orange, saucer shaped object. It was very bright. The object was moving downwards in the sky.
One, round shaped object. It had red and white bits on it, that were glistening. Was very bright. It moved in a straight line, then landed at the witnesses feet.
A circular blue light contained within an object, the size of a double decker bus. It moved slowly without noise and then disappeared.
One object, as large as a B747. It was triangular/V-shaped. Was orange in colour. Brightness was brighter than aircraft navigation lights.
Four spherical objects, that were green on top and red and white at the bottom. Very bright. They made erratic movements and it was like an aerial ballet in the sky.
Three red, green and white flashing lights. They moved faster than a plane. They flew along, stopped and then carried on.
A black, triangle shaped object, with three orange lights. It was the size of a jumbo jet. The object moved as fast as a jet aircraft.
A singular, round, flat bodied, shiny object. The object approached the witnesses boat for a short period and then returned to it's original position.
One, round shaped object. It was silvery white. It was going in a North Easterly direction.
One, circular shaped object. It was blue in colour and quite bright. It was moving in an Easterly direction.
One, circular, red, blue and white object. It was brighter than a star. It moved in a triangular/diamond shaped pattern.
A round, bright object. It had flashing blue, red and white lights. It was slow moving.
One object, about two inches square. It was red and very bright. It went into the witnesses house through the window and moved around the living room.
One, round shaped object. It had a strobe light, that was white with a red tint. Was dimmer than a star. Object was very high up and the strobe light was very fast.
A sequence of red/blue lights in a sort of 'spiral effect'.
A black triangle, smaller than an airliner, but faster. It had a large wingspan with triangular indentations at trailing edges.
Two white lights, similar in brilliance. The second light was half the size of the first light. They disappeared over the horizon.
Two, slow moving lights. The two lights kept together, descended slowly, then rose at the same speed. This happened three times. The lights then just disappeared.
An oval object. It had a green light in the centre and was glowing orange. There was a rushing wind sound. Was going faster than a jet.
Four separate white lights, which then changed to red. There were points of light that were very bright. They were moving North East.
A light aircraft that was silent. It had a beam of light coming down from it. It circled the Rawmarsh area and then vanished.
One blue, disc shaped object, the size of an aircraft. Was about 45000ft high.
A circular object, about 30-40 foot across. The lights on the object were spaced approximately 1-2 ft apart. It moved up and away to the left before disappearing.
There was one large circular object, with two smaller ones beside it. The larger one kept moving from side to side.
One very large object. Was red, green and yellow in colour. It was very bright. It moved very fast Westwards and then disappeared.
One large, circle shaped object in the sky. It was eight times bigger than a triangular shaped object that followed afterwards.
A bright light, it glowed and then became smaller. It was high in the sky.
A star shaped object. It was very high. It moved in an 'inhuman way' on a curved path. Slowed down and then disappeared into outer space.
One 20 inch circular object. It had red and green lights and was very vivid. The object was moving Westwards.
One balloon like object. It was crossing over the AI from West to East and was moving very fast.
A comet with a fiery trail. It was red at the end. The trail was quite short. It was seen Westwards going down.
The witness saw a hovering red light, with a strong white light coming from it.
Four roundish lights, single bed size. White and fairly bright. The lights moved in a small circle at evenly spaced intervals. Then they rotated in a clockwise direction.
A five pointed star, about four times bigger than a star. It was very bright, and lit up the whole sky. It moved along the sky and appeared to get higher and then picked up
One triangular shaped object, airliner 747 size. It was white, with red lights flashing on and off underneath. Was very bright. It was flying straight and level.
A bright object, similar size to a star. It was a lot brighter though. The object began to zig zag erratically across the sky at high speed and then disappeared over the valley.
One large object. Similar shape to an aeroplane. It had bright, white lights along the bottom. A very loud aircraft noise. It was miles away, but then shot over the town at a
A cluster of lights, that were flashing green, red and orange. They were ball shaped. There was static in the air. They made erratic movements.
One round object, with a white light. It also had flashing/rotating blue and red lights. It moved up and down.
One small rocket shaped object. It was dark and dull. It was going fast and was moving straight up.
Five orb and triangle shaped objects. One of them was white and the rest were red. They were bright. They were moving Southwards.
One small, oval shaped object. It was white with blue and red lights. The brightness was glaring. It hovered, then disappeared behind a church.
Two silver objects which formed the letter H. They were bright. They were moving slowly in a straight line.
A white bumble bee shaped object, with lights all over. It was 1000ft high and was moving very fast.
A single light to the naked eye. When seen through binoculars, there was a group of coloured lights moving around. Lights were moving around each other.
One ball shape object, with indentations on the top. Was white and bright. It was higher than a normal aircraft. It was slow and steady and went upwards.
A bright silver object, with red and green lights at the back. It changed to an egg shape, went bright yellow and then vanished. Moved quickly across the sky.
A flashing/revolving light. It was white. Was slow moving above the horizon.
A disc shaped object, with a 20ft wing span. Was flying in controlled circular motions.
Two circular shaped objects. They were rotating in a cloud of smoke. They were very bright. The object was spinning and following the witnesses car.
One object, 20 times the size of a jumbo jet. It was bird shaped, and very bright orange in colour. It was moving in a straight line, banking from left to right.
Two revolving lights that were moving around each other. They were flashing at different speeds. Were 200-500ft in the sky, and moving from East to West.
One oval shaped object, eight times larger than a star. It was white and yellow in colour and very bright. It was South West in the sky.
A circular or oval shaped object. Was mauve/silver in colour. The craft was illuminated in some way. It was travelling at a very high speed from left to right.
A flying saucer, with red, green and gold lights. It had been hovering.
One round object. Bigger than a star. White and bright. It moved horizontally, from South to East at very high speed. It was similar to a shooting star.
One meteorite. Had a fiery tail. Quite big. Was moving in a straight line, and heading West.
There were two objects glinting in the sun. One object was following the other.
Three round, star sized objects, in a triangular formation. They circled around each other, and then went back to their original position. White and very bright. They were
One glowing light with a short trail. Was at a 45 degree angle. About 20000ft in the sky.
One round shaped object. Red, orange and green in colour and bright. The object was stationary.
Three or four red lights. One was larger in size, and was 3ft by 3ft. They moved very fast.
One saucer shaped object, with a swirling spiral of white/grey luminous light. The lights turned blue and then back to their original colour. It moved towards the witnesses
One object, larger than a person. Flat like a playing card, no depth. Looked like two legs hanging from it. Dark, but there was a glimmer at the rear. It disappeared due East.
The object was circular and then changed to a triangular shape. Was white, red and green in colour and light. Was about 35,000ft up.
One ball of fire, with a tail. Was orange coloured. It was above the horizon quite far away, but dropping down.
Two spherical, pinky red, illuminated objects. They were going from SW to NE. Three thousand feet high. Were travelling at a fast speed of  approximately 1500-2000 mph.
Six or seven, small round shaped objects, in a line. They had red lights on them. They came from the West and then moved to the East slowly, then departed at speed.
One bright, white star. Was moving from East to West and very fast.
A semi-circle of six to seven red lights, that were sixty to seventy yards apart. They maintained level height.
A triangle formation of flashing red lights. They were moving from West to East at a constant speed.
A delta formation of Eleven to thirteen flashing red lights. They were moving slowly from South East to North West.
A very bright orange ball. Was silent, with a dim, flashing white light. It moved very slowly and smoothly to the East.
Two objects, but not seen together. There was a bright light at random intervals. The light was bigger than the stars. The objects zig zagged across the sky on a continual
One diamond shaped object seen, with a bright light in the centre of the undercarriage. The object travelled from West to East in a straight line.
A bright, white star. It was 70,000ft high and was moving in a straight line. Was too fast, to be an aircraft.
A bright, white light. It eventually moved Southwards, towards Saddleworth.
One star shaped object. White in colour. It moved from South West to North East.
A fire ball. It was approximately 35 degrees from horizontal. It made a steady downwards movement.
A large, wide bell shaped object. It had white lights. Was approximately 15ft off the ground and 25ft to 30ft long.
Three triangular shaped objects, which were amber in colour. They were travelling quite fast. They were overtaking each other. The objects moved Westwards until they
A silver dome in the sky, above the clouds. The sunlight was reflecting off it. It skimmed above the clouds.
One triangular shaped object. It was 40ft in size. It had orange and green lights along the edges. Not very bright, but was pulsating. Was moving downwards and made a
Approximately 30 to 40 small white lights. They were moving erratically.
Six objects that looked like 'Fancy rats'. Were green and white in colour. They made circular patterns in the sky.
One object that had four lights on it. The lights were green, white, red and blue. The object was spinning in the sky.
Two white objects. They were motionless in the sky. They then started drifting slowly to the East.
An object was hovering in the sky. It then moved up and down and from side to side. It had bright lights.
One, very big, round shaped object. Was green, red and yellow in colour. It had lights that looked like a normal aircraft's lights. It moved North, hovered and then slowly
One star shaped object. Was orange and very bright. The object was moving South West.
One triangular shaped object. Larger than a normal aircraft. It had three lights and one of them was red. It was stationary at first, but moved quickly away.
Two very large craft. Yellow/golden in colour. There was a hovercraft type noise. 30 lights per craft and they were arranged in horizontal and vetical patterns. They stopped
Three objects in a triangular formation. They were white, and one of them was bright. The lights were stationary and then split up and went in different directions.
Two objects. They both looked like a triangular shape of lights. Both objects were a dull amber colour. They made, fast and erratic movements and then disappeared.
There was an object that had a light at either end. There was a flashing white light that was very bright. It made constant turning movements and then erratic movements.
One triangular shaped object, similar size to an airliner. It was black in colour. It was moving in a North Westerly direction.
Cylindrical object, with a dome on it. 2000ft high in the sky.
A circle of light appeared on the witness's bonnet. The electrics were lost for a short time.
A big red ball, that floated slowly to the ground.
A grey, saucer shaped object. It was spinning. It hovered and then shot straight up.
One black object, which had blue lights on it.
One, large, circular, white ball. Was very bright. Was moving East and going very fast.
One, white, star shaped object. Very bright. It was moving East.
An 'A' frame, shaped object. Was moving North East over Newark and was very high in the sky.
Two lights that were stationary. Then there were a further three lights in a triangle formation, with a red strobe observed in the centre.
At first, it looked like a very bright spot of light, but after a while, it became a stack of four different coloured lights.
Two large, red triangles. They were stationary.
One object, large, undiscernible shape. Was white: like "white hot". It was descending.
Two bright lights were hovering. The object swooped down and then hovered just above ground level and then rose up into the sky.
One glowing white and orange, round object. It moved up, down and around, and then moved in a Westerly direction.
One ball shaped object, that was mainly yellow, with a red side light. Was very bright. It had a tail. It moved upwards, then started falling.
A round, spinning, silver object. It had white lights round it, with red circular lights inbetween them. It moved slowly.
One, round shaped object. Had red, green and blue colours and was very bright. Was moving East.
One, round shaped object. Green and dim. Was moving West and then fell from the sky at a steady rate.
A shadow of a delta winged aircraft, moved across the stars. It had a steady pink light on the front, and two at the back. Was silent.
A green, star shaped object.
A huge light in the sky, with a smaller light above it. The light went on and off three times, then disappeared.
One large, circular object. White and very bright. The object was moving backwards and forwards.
One bright light. Not high enough to be a star.
An orange, green and yellow object. The object was flying low and erratically.
Eight, bright orange objects, like stars - pinpricks. They split into four and then reformed. They were moving fast from left to right.
A streak of light was seen. It went in a straight direction and then faded out.
It was a light, with sparks coming from the rear. It was heading for the ground.
A bright, circular light, at approximately - 1000 feet above the ground. It had a short tail and was silent. Was travelling about 500mph.
A single object. It changed colours - from purple, red, yellow and green. The object appeared stationary for long periods, then disappeared.
Twelve semi-circular shaped craft flying in formation. They were flying from North to South.
A white light was travelling at high speed, in a South-Westerly direction. It circled the moon and then disappeared.
Two jet sized objects. They had red lights and one white light. Very bright. There was a rushing sound. Flying West and very slow.
Stationary white light. It appeared to be rotating, with rays coming from it. Was moving East.
A bright, circular red light. About 3mm in diameter, relative to cockpit windscreen. Was moving in a Westerly direction.
Triangular shaped object. It was hovering in the sky.
Bright orange light. Object was moving West. It was low on the horizon.
Very bright, white light. The shade changed. Also, looked like a gas cloud. About 6-7,000ft high. Was moving South-West.
Circle of red lights with a purple centre. They were far away, and then got closer.
One object, like a parachute or flying-wing shape. It was dark green.
One very large, disc shaped object. Red, white and blue colours. Was bright, but got duller as you got nearer. Possibly burning.
Two huge explosions - very bright light. No sound though. Miles high and directly above.
One object, very bright. Colours were changing in sequence - white, yellow and red. UFO remained near aircraft's 10 o'clock and then disappeared.
One object, no bigger than a star. White and very bright, and brighter than a star. The object was moving South-West.
Single spherical object, approx. 5-7 feet in diameter. Metallic, high gloss finish, but with signs of grime on underside. A machined appearance.
A red, yellow, fiercely burning ball of fire, with embers falling off. It looked the size of two dinner plates, with tennis balls falling off, and burning out.
One small, kite sized, leaf shaped object. Was bright red in colour. Moved very fast.
Circular in shape with a tail and extremely bright. It moved incredibly fast in different directions across the sky.
One, larger than a Hercules, elongated object. Red/green - long lights, white lights at the back, in squares. Very bright.
Three white lights. One red light on top. Was rocking from side to side, and then faded.
A beam of light was shining upwards. Then a crescent shaped object was seen. It moved slowly across the sky.
Cigar shaped object. Was white with a green tinge. Was seen for a few seconds, accelerated extremely fast and then disappeared.
A large object. The same size as the moon. It went vertical straight through the cloud.
Like a meteor - silent sphere of light. Was moving in an arc, going from South East to North East. It then disappeared.
Light, orange ball. Like a dull shooting star. Silent. Was heading North East.
A long, dark object in the sky. Two bright lights at either end, and several red ones in the middle. It moved vertically and then horizontally.
Low flying white light, with multi-coloured flashing lights on the underside. Was hovering.
Lots of lights together - very fast flashing red lights in a cluster. Very bright and it appeared large.
Object looked triangular in shape, defined by three flashing lights. One on the right was green and the others white.
Black, triangular shaped object, with two fins.
One object, thought to be a star, with stud like lights underneath in a circle. Was travelling North in a straight line.
Three red lights in a triangular formation. There was a silver star shaped object, below the lights.
Spherical shaped object. Was bright and pulsating. Looked like a large light bulb. 100ft diameter? - not sure. Slow moving.
One, airline sized, cigar shaped object, with a red light. Quite bright. The object was moving erratically.
Main object - large, red/orange luminous ball. There were two smaller objects that had totally different flight paths.
One object, the size of a passenger plane. Was triangular in shape and silver. Very bright, due to the reflection of the morning sun.
One red and green object. It was still.
One oval shaped object. Bright green/blue in colour. Half magnitude brightness - of the moon. It shot up vertically in the sky.
Three circular objects, 20-30 feet high. They were orange and very bright. They were stationary for a short time, then disappeared.
Triangular object, like the end of a plane or concord. Three brilliant white lights.
Blast of orange light. In the same direction, three golden balls appeared, that were brighter and then they disappeared.
A black, ruler shaped object. It moved across the moon and then disappeared.
Huge object, like a shooting star. Also looked like a firework rocket, descending down with the exhaust burning.
Twenty eight foot circular object, with a dome on top, which had a bright yellowish/whitish light. Travelled very fast North East.
Two circles of light that were very bright and very close together. They moved at fast speed vertically up into the sky.
A single black triangle was seen.
A central disc, with lights shooting off of it. It was hovering.
One oval shaped object, which was extremely bright with a dark blodge. It was slowly moving across the sky.
One orange object, with a very intense bright light. It was moving very slowly and then it just disappeared.
Two large yellow lights, surrounded by smaller blue/green and yellow lights. They made vertical and horizontal movements.
Purple, diamond shaped object, with a circle in the middle of it.
Blue, circular intermittent light.
Bright light, possibly a shooting star. Was falling to earth very fast.
A large, cylindrical, solid object. It was silver in colour and very bright. The object shot up in the air and disappeared.
Lights were seen dancing in the sky. The lights went up and down in the sky and seemed to keep pace with the witnesses car.
One object. It had a bright white light, and an inner red light. It was moving up, down, backwards and forwards.
Red and white, round flashing lights. Two and sometimes three of them. Moving around.
Very bright, pink light. Shot off at high speed.
A large, black, oblong shaped object, approx. 30-40ft long. It was about 15-25ft off the ground.
The object was like the sun setting, an orange glow. Three lights shot off from it.
The object looked like a red dome. Had a white flashing light, which was small and bright.
A round, and very bright object. Equivalent to a 5p coin in size, at arms length. Was stationary and then disappeared.
The object looked like two lights. The width was about 10 metres across. Was hovering.
Bright stars in the shape of a "T". Then a bright orange light was seen. High in the sky. They were descending slowly.
Five, round, smooth objects. There were red and blue flashing lights, going round in a circle and another light in the centre. Quite fast.
Very large spherical object, with multi coloured lights. Was moving at high speed.
Twenty five to thirty, small disc shaped objects, that were illuminated. It veered away.
One large, square-ish, very bright object. Was blue-ish with lights around it. There was a humming sound and a nasty smell.
The object was silent, and was changing from pale blue to green then yellow, and had one bright light. It moved erratically in the sky.
An object, had blue lights on the top and white lights on the bottom. Was 40ft in length. About 600ft high.
One round, grey object, helicopter size. Revolving clockwise - plate spinning. Witness could see windows, and a glow coming through them.
One large star - like object. It had colours that were changing.
A UFO was hovering and had numerous flashing lights, of all different colours. The object hovered in the sky for about 10 minutes.
Two, jelly fish shaped objects. They were very bright. Moving in a South Easterly direction.
One triangular object, with flashing green and red lights.
One oval object, displaying five, bright searchlight type lights. The object was straight and level and moving slowly.
An object in slow motion, with twelve to fifteen lights around the perimeter. 40ft to 50ft in size. The object descended behind trees.
Numerous crescent shaped white lights. Very bright. There was one red light. They moved slow at first, and then picked up speed.
Single white light. It had a faint light behind it. It was moving slowly.
A huge meccano/round type looking structure/object, with pulsing red, green and white lights. Very slow moving.
A very large object.
A black rectangular object, with a small fuselage. Was moving very fast.
An orange ball of light, with a white ring around the outside of it. It travelled along in a straight line.
Three flare shaped objects. They were yellow in colour and very bright. They were about 500ft up and moving in the same direction.
One oval/bell shaped object. Light in colour and very bright. It made a humming sound, which drew the witness's attention to it.
Five, white objects that were very high in the sky. Very slow.
One flattened rugby ball shaped object, with a long needle hanging. White or silver in colour. Extremely fast.
Seven lights - six together and one in front. The lights merged and moved in formation. They were very very high.
One long shaped object, with six flashing lights. They were flashing from faded to very bright. They were moving from North to South.
Three red lights in a triangle shape, 200ft up. Moving very slowly and changing pattern. There was a low humming monotone sound.
One light, golden in appearance, larger and brighter than a planet. Was travelling from South West to the East.
No distinctive shape, but was extremely bright red. Had white and blue flashing lights. It was extremely noisy. Shot off at great speed.
A strange group of lights were seen by various witness's. The lights were moving in irregular patterns. They shot off at great speed.
Two star sized lights about 15 feet apart. There was also one red light. They were the intensity of the North Star.
Orange discs that were tennis ball size. There were two side by side, one on right hand side - catching up and one behind.
One object, small car size. Oval in shape. Blue-ish green in colour and very bright. Stationary for a while. There was a burning coal smell.
One white ball of light, the size of a 5p piece at arms length. Plus, there were two smaller, faint objects in trail too.
One square shaped object. Had blue, red and white lights and was pretty bright. Was stationary and then floated - glided along.
A flying saucer.
A ball of white light. It was travelling East. Before it disappeared, the ball of light changed colour to red!
Saucer shaped object, that was revolving in the sky. Was greyish-white in colour. Was hovering and rotating.
One oval shaped object. Was orange in colour, but was quite dim. It was travelling West and was very fast.
One oval shaped object. Charcoal grey in colour.
One star shaped object. White and blue in colour and very bright. Was moving to the North from South-West.
Round object. Bright white. 400ft up in the sky. Stayed level as it moved across the sky.
Two diamond shaped objects. Yellow and very bright. The objects were zig - zagging in the sky.
Arrow shaped object, with a light at each corner, plus one underneath. It went in a North, North-West direction.
Star like in shape. Very bright. The object was almost vertical and descending.
Saw lights in the sky.
The object was round in shape. There was a very intense white light. It was moving slowly.
Bright, large, cone shaped, single object. One and a half inches in size. There was static. It was moving in a straight line downwards.
One, jelly bean shaped object. Had a mirror finish and was reflecting the sun.
Three, hundred foot, sphere shaped, white objects. They were moving from North to South in a straight line.
One object, larger than a star. It was round, white, brighter than Venus and had three tails.
One, very large flying saucer. 1000's of lights on the underside, with one larger centrally placed red light. It moved slowly away.
A squashed, elongated disc with a yellow glow. It faded and then brightened.
Pinpoints of light. Objects were changing speed.
Saw dim lights in a circular shape, spinning round.
One very large disc shaped object, that was pale blue.
One large, circular object, that had blue lights that were spinning.
One dim object, that had two white lights and two red lights.
Lights were seen in the sky, that looked suspicious.
8-10 white lights, rotating around one similar light.
One circular object with square lights and windows from the outside going to the centre. Was large and revolving.
One glowing outer ring, surrounding an oval structure with pulsating lights.
One bright light, that was star like, which dimmed, brightened then dimmed again.
One small, bright star shaped object, which was moving upwards. Was very slow.
Vortex with white, red and green flashing lights. Rose straight up vertically from behind woods in the form of an arc. Smokey trail.
Saw a light travelling very fast in a South Westerly direction towards Barking.
One very bright object.
Two spot shaped, star coloured objects were spotted moving through the sky very fast.
It was like a shooting star, but with unsynchronised flashing lights.
One small, spherical, silver object. Was very bright. Football size perhaps.
Like a jet airliner, but very low and with no wings. It accelerated away.
One object with three flashing lights.
One object that resembled a coloured star. Was red, orange and green in colour. Made erratic movements, then vanished.
There were three twinkling lights.
One spherical object that had various colours and was very bright.
Four main lights formed a cross. There were bright green and orange lights in the centre. Was larger than a 747.
One huge, silver, star shaped object.
Described as a yellow/white 'glow', with flashing lights. Was moving very fast.
One white circle travelling in a straight line. There was then an extremely loud explosion over the sea.
Bright green light, three large green windows, 8 ft apart, oval in shape and was a quarter of a mile long.

One object looked like a yellow moon, second one looked like a triangle with red flashing lights, and the other three looked like silver balls moving in a circle
formation. The noise was a very loud noise, like the roar of many engines.
Many white, small beams that were flickering.
(Saw the same objects as above).
Two points of light, that were too big to be stars. Also, circles of yellow light. They were hovering and pulsating.
One white object, star shape. Much brighter than a star.
Bright flickering light, with changing colours - red, white and green.
One circular, gold coloured object.
A star size, bright object. Was blue/white in colour.
Lights in the sky. They moved, stopped and then zoomed off.
One object, like an oval pebble, white on top and black underneath.
A very bright, white light in the sky, moving fast.
One bright, white light that was moving very slowly in an unusual way.
Was a hazy shape, had three lights at the bottom like traffic lights, surrounded by a fog.
One white object with diffused light.
Looked similar to a division sign - two stars either side of line.
One object, bigger than a star. Bright, but had no colours.
A red and white flashing light that was moving extremely fast.
Two black spheres close to each other. There were no lights at all, and they were moving fast.
One to four bright triangular objects, that then changed to a round shape. They were all white. (Were there for one hour).
One, black teddy bear shaped object. Was moving very fast through the sky. Sounded like a helicopter engine.
One 6-8 ft long, 2-3 ft wide, oval, greyish, solid object that circled around the witnesses house.
Several, round, elliptical, bright lights shining upwards. Was moving backwards and forwards.
Several pairs of small, elliptical, silver objects descending from the sky.
Extremely bright flash of light. Was there for 1-2 seconds.
Large, round circular object with orange lights on the outside which changed colour. Centre had green lights which changed to blue.
Bright lights were seen through the witnesses bedroom curtains.
Two objects larger then planes, both had round fronts going to points. Red and blue lights on front of objects.
Object over house.
One car-sized, cloud shaped, yellow luminous object. There were also flashing lights. Was about 100ft up.
One object - a single light flashing.
One sparkly light, blue/white and very bright. It was jumping back and forth, but not moving any distance.
Four small white objects, like dim stars.
One object with a bright light, and another object with it, had three bright lights.
One large cylinder shaped object estimated at 40m wide, displaying misty white lights.
One, round, white object that had the brightness of a star. It was erratic when it moved.
Two, oval white objects.
Spheres - colours on and off in sequences.
Five to six circles, one object, larger than a jumbo jet. Was rotating.
Two objects that were orange and had a dull glow.
One object that was golf ball shape, that had triangular lights on either side.
Triangular object that was rotating. There were three to five lights underneath, that were also rotating.
Very large, oval/round shaped object - illuminated (like the moon).
One global object that was pulsating and was very bright.
One bright, orange flashing light. It hovered for a while, then sped off faster than a conventional aircraft or helicopter.
Lots of bright lights.
Saw flashes of light every few minutes, plus one long silver beam.
One single bright red light - (square or oblong). Sort of a humming noise.
Two objects that were spherical, shiny and silver. Objects looked approx a quarter of an inch across.
One object that then split into two. Was about the size of a minibus. Wedge shape and silvery white. Sun reflected off of it.
One object, roughly the same size as a Harrier, but there was no noise. Was brightish, with lights flashing underneath.
Four triangular objects in formation. They were yellow/white in colour and were moving across the sky.
Small white cloud - looked unnatural and had a reflection coming from it, which appeared to revolve. It disappeared after 20 seconds.
Very bright white light.
Dull, orange, elliptical, 10 Arc.
A long, cylindrical object with no defined edges. Was black and very dull. Looked like it had three layers.
Very large cigar - shaped object, with six sets of lights underneath. Thinks it could have been an airship.
Five star like objects in a perfect line. Appeared at a very high altitude.
A ball of changing colour, with lots of different coloured lights around it. Made helicopter sounds. It stayed in place for about two hours.
One object that was round and white. It had an orange underside.
One object - oval/eye shaped with bright white light.
Two white fireballs in the sky. First fireball went in an arc. Second fireball went vertically.
One object, flames, black smoke, defined mass, unable to tell exact shape.
One object, bigger than a jumbo jet? Was like a line. Had two red lights, one white and one blue. Very bright.
One object, the size of a house, with a pinnacle top with a dome. Orange but dull in colour. Very erratic and fast.
One star like object. Red and green flickering lights on the object.
One object with tentacles. 300 Approx?
One, quite large pear shaped - flat fronted object. White with red sparkles and a blue tinge. Very intense brightness.
One huge 'aura' was seen, was tapered to one end, like a pen. Was multicoloured and shimmering.
Two shapes the size of a car, burning in appearance. They were spinning and silent.
One smallish, blue-ish circle that was very bright. Was moving quickly from West to East.
One beam of blue light that was very bright. It then turned white and then disappeared leaving a vapour trail.
An apparent explosion with a fast disappearing tail.
Plume with a tail like a rocket, that looked like a white flame, with orange and pink edges. Was very bright. Moved vertically up.
White, bright light that was maybe a comet. Was seen for 2-3 seconds.
A white ball with a long tail was seen. The witness said that it was probably a comet.
One bright, white light in the shape of a circle, with a vapour trail.
A silver object with a short tethered tail.
One round, dim orange object. Moved from North to South.
A dim, orange light in the sky.
One, white shining light. Made a whoosh sound.
Elongated pear shape, turquoise in colour. Had like a shooting star effect. Very low and large.
There were several blue-ish, white-ish lights.
Red ball type of object, like the sun, going around in a circle behind the clouds.
One object, two miles wide-ish and V shaped. Had 11 white and orange lights and was very bright.
Lots of shooting stars/flares, that were gold, green and white. Very bright.
Large, circular, with silver, red, green and blue lights.
Large, unidentified object, like a reflection on car windscreen. Smokey silvery colour. It rotated and moved parallel to the A14.
One object - very bright strobe light.
One huge, dull, greenish object. Looked circular shaped when it moved.
One huge circle with another circle in it, and several smaller circles inside this circle.
Two rings of squares of dull blue-ish light, spinning very fast and tilting. Very large. Changed to a cigar shape.
One large, white, oval object, with 150 - 200 lights. The object was still, and then started spinning.
One large, dark hexagonal object with two white lights. Was humming and flew low over the witnesses house.
A round object in shape, with a pale yellow vapour trail. The object was travelling in a vertical downward direction.
A UFO.
One very big, bright white triangular object with a light on each point.
Unusual light in the sky. Was not a star or a plane. Did not move for the hour in which the witness watched it.
One very bright, white light. Very high altitude.
One enormous, dark triangular object with three green/blue-ish lights.
Several white lines and dots of medium size. They were flashing.
One very bright, circular white light. Was moving from East to West.
Flashing lights. They disappeared and then reappeared at midnight.
Very bright star. It moved very fast, too fast to be a plane.
Saw strange vapour trails, plus unusual objects that came from the horizon, wiggled round a bit, then went again. From across the English Channel.
Objects smaller than aircraft, moving around high in the sky.
Single object - much larger than a star. The shape of a spider's web, very bright with rainbow colours. Glorious. Was stationary.
One bright, circular, white, red and green object. Was pulsating.
Large bright triangle, grey on the perimeter. Three orange lights on each point. Travelled across the sky not particularly fast.
One diamond shaped object with red circles on it.
A line of 3 or 4 lights, orange in colour.
Gold coloured ball with a tail (like a comet), which was very bright.
Oval, grey, single object - approx. 6ft. Was heading South.
One disc with a bright light.
An object that was changing colour. Green lights/lasers. Stationary, hovered and the moved.
Four large objects (each one was 3 times larger than a Hercules).
Boomerang shaped object. Flew over head very quickly and then disappeared.
There were a series of lights, that were fast.
Objects that appeared from nowhere, flew erratically and were pilotless, sometimes accompanied by a bright flash. Seen everyday for the last three years.
Squashed oval shaped object. Did not have the usual aircraft lights on it.
One disc shaped object, no indication of size. There were two bright, blue flashing lights on it.
One flat, triangular object, (like a shield), white in colour. Coloured lights mainly round the edge of the craft. Spotlight beneath.
One main object, blue, red and white.
One large oval, with a sphere in the middle. Had bright blue, green and white lights on top of the craft. There was a humming noise.
One or two round, star sized objects were seen. They were multi coloured.
One light, with red, green and yellow alternating lights on it.
One sphere, that was alternating in colours - red, white, green and blue.
One object, a pinprick of light changing colour between red, green and orange.
Like a bright star, with red, green and blue lights flashing in it. Hovering silently.
Bright multi coloured light in the sky.
Two objects, four times larger than the largest star and round like a glitter ball. They had blue, red and green lights on them.
Bright light, larger than a star, changing colours, from white to orange, blue and green and back again. Appeared to be moving slowly.
Bright light, like a star.
Two objects, oval shaped and bright white. Then later, another two objects that looked the same, appeared.
Flashes of light came through the bedroom window. A bright star-like object was then seen outside.
Flying saucer shape, with three square like windows, like a house. Was light - got lighter, then dimmed. Slightly tilted.
One large, L - shaped object. Was very bright.
White light with shimmering green and red lights.
Bright orange light.
Looked like an aeroplane, (had wings, but no propellers). It was silent with red and blue lights on it. Was hovering above the tree tops.
One object with grey/white tubular fins at both ends.
Cross shaped collection of five star like objects. Gold coloured lights.
Two opaque spheres. The two objects were chasing each other around.
Round in shape. Coloured red, green, blue, white and yellow.
One, circular object, very dark with four permanent red lights and three to four pulsating lights.
One round object, with a very bright, white light. Was hovering like a yo-yo.
Five, six or seven unusual light objects. Moving in all different directions.
Boomerang shaped craft. Red flashing light on the front and a white consistent light on each side. Was hovering.
One diamond shaped object. Had white/blue colours on it. Was very bright. Was hovering and moved up and down too.
One indistinct shaped object that was white and very bright.
A silver ball of light. It darted around and was very fast.
Circular object, the colour of a green traffic light. It moved in a steady, straight line.
One object that was hovering.
A single blue and red object. Very bright. It made an S pattern in the sky, when finished, moved North East.
Single aircraft/object, that had rotors. It had blue, red and white strobes.
One oval spot light.
Single object, rectangular, like a fire ball, with a red centre and an orange or yellow aura.
A UFO that looked like a helicopter? It hovered and then shot off into the distance. It had red flashing lights!
Three or four lights linked by a green lattice.
Primary radar contact, ten miles wide. Object was travelling very quickly.
A 'Hub-cap on it's side' shape, which was a very bright orange/yellow colour.
Two large objects that changed from a water drop shape, to a 'U' shape then separated into squiggly lines. Very bright orange/yellow colour.
Eight small circles forming one large circle, which was green in colour.
One exceedingly bright white light approximately 10 metres in diameter. Appeared to be disc shaped.
The object looked like a dull orange ball, the size of a tennis ball. It made a jig movement.
A silver ball was hovering for a few seconds and then shot off.
Two objects diagonally above one another, initially blue in colour, they disappeared for a few minutes and reappeared orange in colour.
One quite big, round shadowy object with bright lights. There was a droning sound.
Two lights in the sky, one bigger than the other.
Two very large round, white objects. They were very bright. Were drifting across the sky in a Westerly direction.
Three very large round, white objects. Extremely bright. Stationary, but then moved away very quickly.
Two very large round, white objects. One larger than the other. They were very bright. Just stayed stationary.
Two very large round, white objects. Very bright. Were stationary and then moved West.
Two very large round, white objects. Very bright.
Stationary lights, that then disappeared and then reappeared.
Two bright stationary lights, low on the horizon. The lower one was brighter. They were stationary in the sky for 30 minutes.
Two static lights that were very bright and large. No movement at all.
Two very large, white objects that were very bright. One was larger than the other.
Two large round, white objects. Very bright light. The objects remained stationary for about 15 minutes.
Two large round, white objects. Very bright. Were slowly moving West and lowering.
Bright light, pale blue and purple in the centre.
Two large round, white/yellow lights.
Two bright lights that were approximately one degree apart.
Two objects. Top one had a pale white light. The bottom one had a red/green light. They glided along the sky.
Disc with lights. Was hovering.
Looked like Saturn - had a ring around it. Had lots of flashing lights. Could have been an advertising balloon.
Bright yellow object. The object was moving from South to North.
Approx. size of ten football pitches, shaped like an arrowhead. Moving towards and upwards.
White lights.
Rectangle/yellow light.
One dozen objects. Red, green, blue and white colours. The objects were stationary and revolving.
Black ball shaped object. Also looked metallic. Changed direction of travel from South to East. Quite fast.
Lights seen at various times, after dark. The lights were triangle and diamond shaped. They were moving in different directions.
Lights in a circle. They were spinning clockwise and oscillating.
Two dark grey objects. They then looked translucent. They were manoeuvring and then disappeared into the cloud.
One large circle, not constant, as it changed. Yellow and very bright. The object was moving very slowly.
Bright star shaped light, about the size of a hot air balloon. Object was still, then dropped in height below tree line.
Flashing lights that were various colours. Shape unknown. Moving West.
Four yellow lights. Changed from square to diamond shape. The object was travelling from East to West.
One, large, round white light. Very bright. Moving from West to East.
Cardiff - Set of one red, blue and yellow lights in a straight line. Very bright. Pontypridd - one set of bright white lights in a triangle.
Low flying, hovering, silent aircraft.
One star sized object, brighter than a star. Stationary at first and then moved Westward.
Two round objects. They had a faint red glow. One reversed on itself and then travelled North to join the other one.
A triangle of lights that went across the witness with no sound. They were travelling from North to South at a fast speed.
Large, glowing object, brighter than a starry glow and bigger than a star. Appeared to have a 'line' through it.
One bright, white light. Object was static to the South.
One large, round object. White and very bright. Was travelling North West.
One large, round object. White and very bright. Was travelling North West.
Bright light.
Star shape - coloured red, green and blue.
Triangular UFO weaving from side to side and changing colour over Newburgh for two hours.
One object, four times larger than Venus. Halogen coloured. Brighter than Venus.
One object, four times larger than Venus. Halogen coloured. Brighter than Venus. Was stationary for quite a while.
One capsule. Blue and silver at rear.
Lots of swirly white lights. 40-50 ft wide. Circular and very bright. Transparent like a jellyfish. Lights were coming and going.
One large circular object with bottom missing.
Irregular pattern of lights - coloured white, blue, yellow and red.
Very bright point light - source light flashing white, with four quick flashes then a gap. Object climbed rapidly in 30 seconds.
Five circular objects. Green, red and white in colour. Extremely bright. They were moving North.
One circular object. White and bright.
Object as large as a saucer, painted with a fine brush. Flicking now and again.
Circular shaped object. Too high to be a bird and too low to be a plane. Was travelling from East to West.
Boomerang shaped object, silent. Moving in a North East direction.
Five lights going into a centre and breaking away to a circle. They were circling.
One haze of light with two tyre like spheres in the middle. Was white with a yellow haze and was very bright. Stationary at first.
One round object, very bright. Was yellow with a red flash.
Various rounded, orange/yellow objects. Very bright. Fourteen at once, down to three. Going Westerly.
