One object, balloon shaped. Had a bright white glow. Moved slowly to the left and then stayed stationary for a while.
A bright light hanging in the sky. Looked like it had bits trailing off of it. Appeared to be stationary.
Round and a dull orange. Was swaying, while moving upwards, and then changed direction as if guided.
Two large, yellow, bright lights. Didn't look like they were moving.
Star shaped object with a tail above it. Was a yellow/white colour and very bright. Moving, but almost vertical. Then moved West.
White light, very bright. Object approached slowly from the South, appeared to be stationary, before heading East and vanishing.
One object, white and very bright. Very high up and very fast.
Very large, bright, star shaped object. Was low in the sky and hovering.
Very large circular set of lights in a tilted circle. Then split into two semi-circular arcs, then joined up again. White and very bright.
One circular, red, yellow,  blue and green object. A strong brightness. It made sudden movements.
One object, the size of a hot air balloon. Was bright, with a honeycomb of light. Was stationary and then flew off.
One metallic sphere, approximately five-six metres. Was flying erratically from South to North along the Rhymney Valley.
The object was round. Was green, red, blue and yellow in colour. It darted from left to right and toward the Witness's vehicle.
Very bright, highly reflective object. Not like usual aircraft and did not have wings or a tail. Was rotating horizontally.
Disc/star shape object with coloured lights, blue and green, spinning around it. Sphere of light high in the atmosphere.
One thirty foot, silver ball/sphere. Vertical at first. Was still and then moved Southwards very gradually.
Object - domed shape. It had a bright, white light and was flashing. Object was stationary for about 45 minutes.
Line of lights, very intense. Steady red lights on top. Moving away at an angle moving to the right. They were horizontal.
Balloon shaped object, with bright yellow on top and a black, flat base. The object was smooth, straight and level.
One object, bullet shaped, rounded at the sides. Was jet black and very noticeable against the light evening sky. Headed North.
One large, black object. It glided. Was oscillating and climbing. Moving North.
Single circular object, the size of a golf/tennis ball. White and very bright. Very slow.
Oval transparent, except outer edge, object, which gave the whole appearance of a smoke ring. Outline was dark. Changed shape when it moved.
Bright, white light with a red tinge. Vertical, then started moving erratically.
Saucer shaped, about 80ft in diameter. Was about 20ft to 30ft off the ground. It made a rattling sound. Six beams, bright light.
Circular object, size unknown. It was surrounded by red and green lights. There was static.
One cylindrical object. White and very bright. Was moving from left to right.
30ft, circular object.
Bright, white light with a red tinge. Vertical, then started moving erratically.
Like a medium, bright star. Made an unusual gentle ark. Then some strange squiggles from left to right. High up in the sky.
One star shaped object. Coloured lights around it - green, blue and red. Spinning.
One, small kite shaped object. Was bright white in colour. Formed an arc shape, then moved away.
Three star shaped objects. They were all white and very bright. They were faster than an aircraft.
Line of three orange lights. Two of them were close together.
One object was a triangle shape and the other, a 'V' shape. Both had green and red lights. One was pulsating.
One object with four bright, white lights on it. It moved in a straight line.
Bright silver object. Was stationary.
Blue lights darting around very quickly.
Numerous. Bright flashing. Like satellites, but definitely not. Were slow then fast.
A bright light.
Ten circular objects, variety. Brightness was less than a star. Object in line, doing zig-zags. Heading North.
Illuminated disc - about approximately 4 inches in diameter. Was vertical. Was moving fast in a straight line.
One object roughly the size of a football or melon. Yellow/orange in colour. Went to a pinpoint and disappeared.
One disc shaped object, bluey silver in colour. Moved in a straight line. Definitely not a star or planet.
Balloon shape. There were lights round the object. Was hovering for some time.
Very bright light. Orange in colour. Much bigger than aircraft lights.
Single disc, star sized. White in colour and bright like a star.
One small, very bright object with a tail. Changing colours. Slight movements - side to side.
Both UFOs were flashing different colours. They appeared to be hovering, but no shape could be seen.
Circular flashing lights. They made extremely strange movements.
A large, brilliant light was stationary in the sky. It moved away fairly quickly and disappeared.
Two blue balls of light - dancing around in the sky.
One orange ball. Very bright. Was humming. Moved in a straight line.
Two lights in the sky. Very bright.
A black saucer/disc which was making no noise and had a bright silver light which appeared to rotate round the saucer.
One object, aircraft size. Long, thin and black in colour.
Round ball. Bright white in colour. Was horizontal.
One large, cigar shaped object. Luminescent green and very bright. The object sort of glided along.
One yellow object. Star brightness. 'Bouncing'
Six groups of coloured lights. White, green and red lights.
Bright light, not blinding, was heading South.
One small, circular object. White and extremely bright. Object appeared to be constructed of a lattice/trellis.
Large, bright object.
Large, bright light hovering near the coastline. Looks like a large star with a small one on top. Red light coming from the middle.
One small, round, white/silver object. Extremely bright.
One car sized object. Tubular shaped. It had three lights at the front, and they were very bright. Moved off at a high speed.
Flat rugby ball - shaped oval object. Had two flashing red lights at the ends. Circled then hovered, then headed off.
One brilliant ball of light. The object climbed very high and very fast in the sky, and then disappeared.
One large object, aircraft size. Bright light in front of object. Long, with wings. Jet sound and very fast. Black smoke coming from the rear.
One object with a red light. Flew level, then climbed vertically, with a grey trail of smoke. Very fast.
Oblong, flexible object. Red in colour. Was very bright and then dimmed a little.
Very bright, intense light. Flared up and moved left to right, very fast. Made sudden movements and quick direction changes.
One large, circular, flat, brown object. Was seen hovering.
A beam of light was seen over a school. A noise was then heard, but not that of a plane or helicopter.
A light was seen in the sky and then a square shaped object appeared, with lights at each corner.
One star shaped object, that was white. Had a very bright light. Moved fast in a straight line.
One object, larger than normal aircraft, tubular shape. Was bright green tinged with blue. Moved downwards leaving trail behind.
Two lights, one large and one small. White and very bright. They were moving from left to right and then to the left again.
A single white light. Was stationary for a while. Fans of light moving left to right and back.
One object, like a rounded saucer that was smaller than a bi-plane. Dark on top and light underneath.
One cylindrical object, that was the size of fuselage or a small/medium aircraft. Bright white. Moved rapidly upwards and then disappeared.
One object, the size of a medium star. Shaped like a ball with three prongs. Green, red, blue and white. Very bright.
UFO with a light, was hovering. A second UFO appeared. Had a large bright, white light. Also seemed to have red and green fleck on it.
One round, football sized object. Translucent green. Extremely bright. Moved quite slowly in a straight line.
Long streak of light in the sky resembling six-eight windows. Side to side, moving very fast.
Green light was seen projecting from the cloud, followed by a pulsed wave of green light. Very bright. In a Southerly direction.
Triangle formation of lights. Suddenly gained speed and headed off North.
Very bright light, ten times the size of a star. Was very high in the sky, and not moving or flashing. Not an aircraft.
A strange object was seen.
A white, onion shaped object, which was glowing white, with sparks. Was moving rapidly in a straight line.
Blue and green lights, with things falling out of the sky.
One object. Size of a bowling ball at arms length. Hexagon shaped. Had red lines on it. Very bright. It moved fast, then vanished.
Large ball with two forks at rear. The ball and between the forks were lit. Not as fast as a jet.
A star like object, growing larger, then shrinking before disappearing. Moving fast.
A small white light travelling in a straight line towards a second light, which appeared to be a star. Then object fell and light dissipated.
Four objects/lights sighted in the sky, moving at varying speeds. They moved erratically.
Object looked like a star, but with blue and red flashing lights. Kept a constant position.
Was described as an 'unidentified foreign object'.
A sphere of bright light, approximately the size of a tennis ball. Falling from the sky towards the ground.
One bright red light, flickering. Static in the air. Was moving to the West.
A large circular light in the sky. After about eight minutes, it drifted off to the West.
A vertical orange line near the horizon. Moved to a horizontal position. One inch at arms length.
A craft with a bright, white light. The craft positioned once and then moved out of sight.
Single, roundish, orange glowing light. Was moving horizontally across the sky, and away in the distance.
Two UFOs, red in colour, followed by what appeared to be two jets.
A series of ten green lights in the sky. They formed a formation, then broke formation and headed towards a large light.
Giant dewdrop shaped object. Had a yellow centre and a green/blue haze around the outside. Too big to be a shooting star.
Two small, ball shaped objects. Orange in colour. Bright and then dim. They were moving upwards.
One, green, red and white lights. Lights were brighter, than on an aeroplane or a helicopter. In sky, remaining static.
One bright star like object, with a green hue surrounding it. Could have been a comet.
White, star like object, twinkling red and green. Did not move. It was brighter than the other stars.
One object. Flickering green and red.
Four lights - blue, yellow, red and white. Four shapes visible through binoculars.
Small light, too far away to ascertain shape. Glittering red, green and white. Did not move.
Saw a UFO. Said it could have been a shooting star or a comet.
One triangular object, with two lights displayed in a similar manner to car headlights. Object rotated about a vertical axis and descended.
The witness just said it was an object.
A large cigar shaped object. The object moved very fast.
A bright, Venus, pale orange object. Was moving as a bird would, in and out of formation.
Six - eight orange blobs. Reasonably light - fuselage. Resembled flight of a bird.
One star shaped object. White and very bright. Very erratic movement.
One very large object. Had a tail. Was green in colour and glowing.
Large Crystal ball object. The size of a light bulb. Yellowy/white in colour. Travelling in a diagonal direction.
One object. Like a satellite or star. White and very bright. Very fast.
One large object. Snowdrop shape. Could be a star/possible satellite. White and very bright. Moving South-East.
Multiple bright lights. Occasionally red and green. Some were moving and flashing. Streaks of light. Erratic, occasionally in formation and then splitting.
Two objects. Had white lights. Brighter as they turned. There was lots of circling and spinning.
Three bright piercing lights. Extremely bright. Three then became four.
White glare. Underneath, another glare, red and blue.
A large, bright object hovering in a South West direction. A few seconds later, it vanished.
One circular object. White and very bright. The object was moving downwards.
One circular object, too big to be a star. Mostly white, but coloured lights too. Moved from right to left at speed.
Bright lights. Cylindrical shape, turning to a V shape. Was moving from East to West.
A large flashing light. It then looked like a white circle flashing in the sky.
A silver object, darting back and forth. Was moving fast and then disappeared quickly. (Message taken - 3 November 1999).
Two small dots, cream coloured. Like half way speed between a satellite and shooting star. (Sent to DAS - 10 November 1999).
A cigar shaped object. Grey in colour, with two windows, with bright lights shining out of them. Travelling from East to West.
A gold disc was seen. It flew through cloud, reappeared and then disappeared.
One large, triangular shaped object. There were three red lights at each corner of the triangle. Also two-three white lights on the object.
One single object. Changed from white to green in colour with an orange tinge. Brighter than any star and flashing. Moved to the right.
One round, golf ball shaped object. Orange and white in colour and very bright. Moving East.
One cylindrical object. Blue and green in colour. Bright and pulsating. Was hovering and moving gradually South-South East.
The object eclipsed the moon. The object was a ring shape.
One, pulsating orange ball. Object was travelling North to South.
A floating object, sitting in front of a cloud formation. Flat and reflecting the sunlight.
Disc that was illuminated. About 200 ft up and 150 ft long.
Two stationary oblong/cigar shaped figures. They were changing colour.
Several lights falling to the ground, towards a bright larger light. The lights were white in colour.
A brilliant white light, travelling at extreme velocity.
Ball shaped object. 40 foot in diameter. Red, purple, green and yellow in colour. A white light was pulsating. Moving horizontally and vertically.
Ball shaped object. 40 foot in diameter. Was bright orange and looked solid. Stationary.
Two items, the size of footballs. They had tails that made them look like tadpoles. Were orange and very bright. Rapidly moving.
An object, like the size of a 10 storey block of flats. Hundreds of white lights. All passed over in formation. They were moving very fast.
One single object, about the size of a mini car, but round. Blue and very bright. The object was stationary, then shot upwards.
An object was flashing intermittently at regular intervals. It was hovering. It had an underside light, which remained static.
Three objects, the size of airliners, and many others, that looked like large shadows. They were all black. Moved in a straight line.
Slow moving lights. They moved from the North to the South and then stopped.
Square shaped object. Greyish in colour. Moving to the North.
Four flashing lights in the sky. They then formed a square. They were moving North-North East.
Four, large, round, orange lights. They were in symmetrical formation and occasionally, a light would black out and re-appear.
Object, triangular in shape. Changed colour - red and green. The object swayed from side to side and then spun in the air.
A saucer shaped craft that was hovering. Also spun. Had protrusions on the outside and five dark circular areas in the middle.
Two star like objects, with the larger emitting a light beam, which was cone shaped. Pinkish in colour.
One object, could only see light, as was shrouded in a sort of mist. Purple light for about five seconds. Very deep blue colour.
Two, white, bright lights. Lower of the two lights, looked like a search light. They were very high.
Two lights, were bright and star shaped. White in colour. One was lighter than the other. They glowed from behind.
Two round objects, bigger than stars. Both red and white in colour. Very bright. Stationary.
One mass of white light, with a green and yellow outline. Was flashing. Stationary in the sky.
Three large, round shaped objects. Dull in colour. They moved from North to South, vertically up and then down.
One oval object. Very bright. Tail like a kite. Moving very fast. Travelling horizontal to the West, dipped, then disappeared.
Three objects/lights that were flickering on and off. They moved West and then moved to the South.
One odd shaped object. Black in colour. Was faster than a plane and moved in a straight line.
One cigar shaped object. Very bright. Very high up in the sky. Slow moving.
A small, red light moving slowly to the South. It did a U turn and moved off to the North at great speed. Then moved in tight circles.
A UFO disc, 33,000 feet up, flying above a jumbo jet.
One star shaped object, which was bright white. Steady movement and then did 90 degree turn and headed North.
Large number of lights flashing and moving around. White light - like a broad band and then tight! They made a circular sweep.
Similar trajectory to a satellite, which brightened during the period of observation. Moved in a Southerly direction.
One object with green bulbous front, tapering off to a lighter green. Had a huge yellow and red tail. Moving very fast horizontally.
Meteor, very bright, with a golden trail.
Five or more bright lights, illuminated in the sky. They were constant, then disappeared.
A cigar shaped object descending at high speed. The object was luminous green in colour. Then a second object appeared that was the same.
One oval shaped object. With flashing red, green and blue lights. Brighter than stars. Was still and then started to hover.
An object that looked like a cylinder. Visible for several minutes.
Comet shaped and with about a one foot long flare, four to six times bigger than a star. Moving from East to North East.
At least twelve, small objects that were saucer shaped. They were silver and glinting in the sun. Very erratic at high speed.
Big chevron shape. It appeared solid, with many twinkling orange lights. Was very fast. Silent.
Red changing to orange lights in the sky. They moved from the North East to South West and then disappeared.
One star shaped object. Moving West.
A very bright light in the sky was pulsing and changing shape. Then the object, 'went out like a light, and disappeared'.
Bright lights heading through the sky. They were moving towards the ground very fast.
One bright yellow and white object. The object had variation in levels of brightness as it crossed the sky.
One large white ball. It hovered and then disappeared.
The object was moving like a satellite, but more erratically. Like a star moving towards other stars in the constellation.
One red circle. Sun shaped. It then changed shape from round, into elliptical.
Bright flash in the sky. Disappeared and re-appeared every three seconds. Was followed by what looked like a satellite.
Six to seven, round, but flat objects. White and fairly bright - clearly visible. They made rapid, random movements.
One to three lights. They were moving West. Fast and erratic.
Eight objects, approx one metre in length. They were round/oval shaped. Light gold in colour. Fast, smooth, gliding movements.
Three objects, larger than a plane, rectangle, square and hook in shape. Were all orange and brighter than Venus.
Mysterious flying object.
An object appeared to follow an airliner. Was 1/8 of the size of the plane, with no vapour trail.
Bright light, steady, but decreasing in intensity. The object then started to move North East.
An object descended in an arc, it had three intense red lights, which seemed to make the whole thing glow red.
One round silver object. It moved very rapidly in an Easterly direction.
One object. Had a bright, white light. Was drifting slowly and making elaborate movements.
Three dull, red domed shaped objects. Described as the size of a house. They were silent and moving together. Were low in the sky.
One kite shaped object. Very bright. The object was moving downwards.
One large sphere shaped object. Looked like polished aluminium. Very bright. Stationary at first, then moved off at high speed.
One object that was cone shaped. It had four white lights at the top, and two red lights at the base. Made a "hovering" sound.
Large object that looked like a dark silver rock. Definitely not an aircraft.
Round orange object, which had orange fire coming off of it as it moved. Ten feet long, ten feet wide.
Triangular lights with red centre lights. Were going about 300mph on their course. Heading North-North West.
One circular object, that looked like the size of a penny held at arms length. Was a white/yellow colour and was very bright.
Large triangular object, top of the triangle looked removed with two orange panels on each side. It had a dark blue top. Hovered.
A noise that sounded like a popping explosion, then a bright light in the sky, round and golden orange in colour.
Small, bright light, sphere shaped. Then the second sighting was a sea horse shape, blue, red, orange and white. Both disappeared.
Small bright light, sphere shaped. Disappeared at very high speed behind the clouds. The second object was the shape of a sea horse.
Four helicopters seen that looked like they could have been chasing an object.
A UFO.
Silver ball hovering above a farmhouse.
One object, quite large, that looked like a light bulb shape. Then it looked circular, metallic and silver.
One spherical, white and very bright object seen.
One beehive shaped and cream coloured object. Was hovering.
Something looking like a UFO, flying saucer and two lights.
One object, like a malteser when held at arms length. Spherical and very bright. Orange, red, green and white colours on it. Pulsating.
Something in the sky lighting up the back garden - light went with it, when the object moved.
Two - flare size. They were extremely bright and falling from the sky.
White, rounded, bright lights.
Fairly large cluster of shapes and they were changing shape from tri-angular to crosses. They changed direction.
One - dome shape. The size of a jumbo jet. Was white in colour and very bright. Moving slowly in a straight line.
One silver, diamond/squid shaped object. Was hissing.
One circular, silvery white disc. Was right above the witness and then shot off.
A bright, white light that moved across the sky, before disappearing.
Black rectangle with a red glow. Took a minute and a half to go across the sky.
Fireball in the sky with debris/lights behind it.
One, possibly two small, flattened figure of eight objects, with links of red. Dull brightness. Was stationary then moved slowly.
Disc shape with hump on top. Was definitely not an aeroplane. Was low down in the sky.
One spherical, dark grey object. Moving South.
Red, blue lights, flashing consecutively, on large spheres - two foot wide - four foot tall.
One sphere, varying and constantly changing. Brighter than the stars.
Red, blue singular flashing lights.
One helicopter shaped object. Had gold and red lighting on it. Was very bright.
One black dot up in the sky. Sort of looked bright considering the colour.
Number of lights in the sky - cluster of five green ones. Vivid white light and various reds. Moved erratically and adjusted it's position.
Large shape - arrowhead. Four/five lights at extremities. Moved very fast - North to South in a straight line.
Object - not a star or a small planet. Was moving around far above normal airspace.
A UFO was seen and filmed onto a VHS tape.
A large fireball/meteorite/piece of debris spotted over the mountains. It seemed to be flaming, rather than glowing.
Red and other coloured lights going on and off. Moving from North to South.
A silver dot moving through the sky.
A bright blob which turned into a streak, before disappearing, to return approximately ten minutes later.
Glowing, with coloured lights around it. Flashing red, blue and green lights.
Diamond shape, with three lights. One red and two white lights changing colour.
One round shaped object with a dark shadow on it.
Lights flying in the sky, five - six, flying in some kind of formation, moving North. Witness heard some sort of noise.
One small, elongated object. Brown and fairly bright.
Five - six orbiting around one. They were changing shape. Grey in colour.
Three lights, bigger than stars. They were white and fairly bright, but not blinding. Erratic, lights moving around one another.
Nine oblong shaped red lights, then two red lights converged over the witnesses house. They moved faster than any aircraft.
An orange ball.
Triangular, stacked as plates, with triangular shaped windows with lights.
One big object, far off. Multi coloured and flickering and getting brighter by the minute.
One, possibly two golden lights. Moving incredibly fast, then disappeared.
One object, large helicopter size, with a cluster of lights. Was white and very bright. Was making bouncing movements.
Lots of flashing lights, like aircraft lights, but could see no aircraft in the area.
Revolving lights on the right hand side of the road, then the left hand side. Looked like a tornado spinning.
Big explosion with an intense white light.
Three - five lights in the sky, very bright. Each object had three - six lights that were changing.
A black triangular shaped object.
One circular, white and very bright object.
Chrome silver dome shaped object - 30 to 40 foot across - with a few small windows. No wings and very reflective.
Eight, large, roundish objects seen. Normal sort of colour and very visible.
Lights in the sky. Were moving in a circular dancing pattern.
A sphere in the sky.
Three cone shaped saucers, bright red and one had a red beam, like a searchlight.
Looked triangular. Black in colour and had green lights underneath.
Two quite big objects - one triangular and one round. The triangle had blue, red and white colours on it. Circle - white, red and orange.
Bright metal star with no jet stream.
Two flashing lights, they were red and green and appeared to be joined. They merged into one large red light.
A luminous green stripe appeared.
Very distant red, blue and white flashing lights. The object hovered and then shot off.
Approximately six lights. They were green and flashing. One end was brighter than the other. Stationary.
Four objects, one object extremely large. They had green lights and were very bright.
One large spacecraft followed observer home and parked outside his house with a green light flashing.
One reddish/gold star, very bright. Zigzagged in a downward movement and was flashing.
Big, blue, bright, round circle. Moved horizontally.
Two star shaped and sized objects, one behind the other, were white in colour and travelling very fast.
Red light. Hovered.
Triangular shaped aircraft. Light on each point of the triangle. Large fluorescent tube - the full length of the trailing edge.
Two ball shapes. The objects moved over the witnesses house.
A UFO.
Circular with lights - five flashing underneath. Also, some lights on the side.
One huge triangular object, with two bright rings and two circles of light. Was moving across the sky very fast.
Two egg shaped objects, with red, blue and green coloured lights. Dome shaped at the top. Flat at the bottom. Blinding white light.
Object - size of a small pea at arms length, round, illuminated from within, (a sort of glowing white). Looked three dimensionally solid.
One pinpoint of light, quite bright.  Erratic movements, from side to side.
Three silver shapes. They were spinning.
White lights in a circle, plus blue lights. The lights were hovering.
Strange lights in the sky.
One large, round fireball. Very bright.
Black triangle craft.
Eight to ten, oval objects, 20ft across. Were green and white. Quite bright. Were rotating. Objects varied in speed.
Two orange lights close together. Very bright. Moved slightly to right and left slowly.
One, oval. Very bright. Moving from left to right slowly.
One object - football sized and shape. Brilliant light with short 'trail' of lesser light. Erratic movement from right to left. Then climbed vertically.
A UFO. Came close to the witness.
Unusual air activity in the sky. The object moved ten times faster than conventional aircraft.
Bright light in the sky.
Three large objects, one looked like a tornado. Green, red and white in colour. Quite bright. The lights were flashing very fast.
One large, round light. Gold, then changed to red/amber. Changing from one side to the other.
One large, circular, pink object. There were also eight - ten circular objects attached.
Cigar shaped object with a bright white light, and a red pulsating light. Two other red lights below the white light.
A round object, that lit up the surrounding area.
A stationary, intermittent, flashing yellow light. Then at one point, there were three objects fixed in one position.
UFO - on one side, five lights, very bright. It moved round and there were three white lights, five - six feet apart.
One silver, cigar shaped object. Moved faster than a nearby plane.
One sphere, bigger than a shooting star. Green and blue and was flashing. Very bright.
Three red stars were moving very fast and randomly at first. They were suddenly zooming around and doing acrobatic things.
One object that was quite large and very bright. Was silent and had no identifying colour. Looked like an elongated arrowhead.
Very bright lights. A sequence of four lights, three lit at any one time. They were orange. Slowly moving in a straight line.
Rubber shape with a V on it's side. One side was orange and it had yellow flames coming out of it. Other side, red flashing light.
Eight objects, very bright. Moved very fast.
A single object, that seemed to hover above a tree line of a wooded area. Changed from white in colour to blue, then red, then white again.
In a lorry, the witness saw a blue/white flash from within woods. The sky took on a red glow. Had an object fallen from the sky?
White light, like a star. Very bright.
Object, roundish shape, silvery white. Was quite low down and enormously bright.
Seen in 2000. Saw a black domed shape. Stayed for a few seconds, before shooting off at extreme speed.
Seen in 2000. Saw a large, silver metal, shining ball, with a dark mist surrounding it, and a blinding light surrounding the mist.
Objects, Lucifer like things, that are seen everyday. They hold people in their homes and are a nuisance.
Bright, flashing lights. Moving to the South.
Like a shooting star, but with a burning tail. About the size of a military aircraft. It looked like it was heading towards the ground.
Twelve objects, pulsating coloured lights. The objects split and moved in different directions.
A silver, cigar shaped object. Was moving near a military aircraft. Was stationary at first.
One object that looked a bit like a star at first. It then split into about half a dozen lights, before cloud crossed over them.
Two objects. The first was triangular in shape and had three orange lights. The second was a bright white light.
650-700 objects - appearance of clusters of stars. White and very bright. Arc from horizon to horizon, East to West.
Round silver ball. The object was moving horizontally.
White light flashing. Was a round shape. Was stationary, moved West and then disappeared.
Seven objects flying in arrow formation. They were moving at high speed from South to North.
One object, aircraft type shape. Dark red in colour, quite dim. No sound. Very high up. Moving in fast, small movements.
One object, triangular in shape. Mainly stationary.
Bright lights were seen in the sky. Then followed what looked like people climbing down webbing into the house.
One square shaped object. Orange light in the middle. Was moving from South to the North and then to the West.
A flashing red and blue pulsing light was seen. Then the object glowed orange and started to move towards the ground.
A bright light that was changing shape and moving fast. Was white in colour. Erratic movements.
Single object, bright, white light that appeared to be moving North. The object went very bright like an explosion.
Very large white light, which turned the sky blue.
White flashing ball, with orange trails. Falling.
Seven foot, silver dome, with a blue glow. Was climbing vertically in the sky, in stages.
One round, star shaped object, with one, white flashing light. Very bright. Stationary, but quivering.
Bright, silvery light. Delta shape. Very bright. Stationary, then circling, then moving back and forwards.
Strobe effect lighting. One above the other. The object moved very fast.
An orange object was seen to do circuits around the Liverpool area. There were flames coming out the front with burning bits falling off of it.
An object, was moving slowly from left to right. The object had an orange glow. Had lights on it.
A silver spin top, bobbing at a height of 300 feet. Was about the size of a football.
One object, the size of a pin dot. Bright and shiny.
One object, size of a helicopter. Red and white stripes/lights, with wings like a Phantom. Stationary then darted about the woods.
Object was a tri-angle shape, like an inverted ice cream cone. The object disappeared down a country lane.
Big, bright light in the sky. Was making circular movements and then it hit the ground.
Elliptical and bright like a star. Movement within object. Moving slowly.
Lights in the sky. Like three triangles.
It initially looked like a star. Looked like it was going to crash into the witness's house. Was a green colour, with red on the side.
One object, with a blue glow, which then turned green. It broke up and left smoke. It seemed very large.
Object, burning up in the sky, breaking into two-three pieces, looked like a shooting star, but lower in sky. Turned green.
Orange ball in the sky, looked to be on fire. Was coming from an Easterly direction.
The object looked like a rocket. Had a white/orange glow.
Large blue, fluorescent, cigar shaped object. The object hovered and then moved away quickly.
Bright ball one end, about the size of a tennis ball, which was lit up. Behind it, a long tail tapered off with a smaller ball at the end of the object.
White ball of light. Was moving from West to East. Stopped and then went up into the sky vertically.
One, main object which was very bright. White in colour. Stationary
A huge fireball streaking across the skies of West Yorkshire.
One multi-coloured object. Round at the front and tapered towards the tail. Was moving from left to right.
Three elongated objects. They all had a white light at each end. They hovered and then moved in formation to the North.
One object, shaped like a half circle. There were three lights on it, changing from white to green to red. Whirring sound.
A large orange ball, with a triangle like structure inside it and two white lights at the edge.
One bright object. Looked star shaped. Rose fast in the sky and then disappeared.
One, spherical, with a reddish hue. Very bright and visible the whole time. Zig zagged across the sky, and very fast.
Circle of flashing white light, shaped like a bracelet. Moved over to the right, then left. Lights turned green and red. NW direction.
One object. Point source of light. White in colour. Stationary for about 10 minutes.
Four, round objects with orange lights. Very bright. Were moving from left to right.
One object, the same size as a star. Multi coloured/very bright. Fluctuating/glowing. Blackhole in centre. Rapid movement.
Bright orange ball in the sky, which 'hopped', before disappearing.
Very bright, like a shooting star. Tri-angle shaped. Flashing lights - red, purple and green. Moving in a Southerly direction.
Looked like very bright stars. They were still, and then moved from side to side.
Two objects with white lights. The second object seemed dimmer. Moving at 90 degree angles. They moved at high speed.
One object, with red, yellow and green lighting on it. Was flying towards Shrewsbury.
Two lights, that were white and constant. They were heading East.
Two large objects. Very bright and the intensity of Saturn. They were moving from North to South.
Two very bright balls of light. They were moving from the West to East.
One main object, very bright. White in colour. Stationary.
One, large green ball which was shining brightly. Moving straight downwards - would have hit the sea 3-4 miles from the coast.
Two small orange lights, far away in the distance. The lights joined and then look bigger. Looked like two sparklers.
One object, that was white in colour. Slow moving.
Explosion in the sky, but with no sound. It looked like a rocket. Was very large and had a blue and red light.
A white ball, followed by a USAF jet that was contrail ling. Was moving at high speed in a straight line.
A UFO. It had bright red, blue and orange flashing lights, in the shape of a tri-angle. Remained stationary for 15 minutes.
A white, circular object with a ring around it. The object moved ten miles in about 2 seconds, then left to right, and then moved East.
An unconventional silent craft, consisting of four red lights, flying low over the witness's house.
Unusual lights were seen over the bay.
Looked like a bright star. Had a pulsating red and green light. Was stationary and then moved off.
Five flying saucers, that were orange in colour. They moved from East to West and then moved quickly over the sea.
A UFO was running parallel to the landing lanes of an East Midlands Jet. (Message taken 2 March 2001).
Two very bright lights, surrounded by smaller lights.
Soft orange lights in formation. They were moving fast to the South East.
Three small lights above a large star shaped object. Very bright light. Was stationary.
A very, bright light was seen. A couple of hours later, a dark object was seen with lights underneath.
Big bright sphere, looked like Saturn.
Red lights, but could not make out the shape. Hovered for a short time, then headed South East at speed.
Two fuzzy white lights, dancing around each other. They were moving to the East.
Two UFOs with flashing red lights. Objects seemed to interfere with the witness's radio and television, while heading South West.
Fifty five suspicious circles in the sky.
Like a bag with two hanging straps, and one lose hanging strap. It was black and changing shape. Was stationary.
A pair of bright red lights were moving from the South East towards the North West. Each light had a double flashing pulse.
Star like object in the sky. Changing colours - red, blue and green.
Like a spotlight in the sky.
Looked like a star twinkling, but when seen through binoculars, it had a red, orange and blue light.
Three fob shaped objects bobbed about in the sky.
The object was high in the sky and was described as having headlights along the side of it.
One bright light. Was low on the horizon. Was seen for about 20 minutes.
A ball shaped object. It gave off a glow, like a hot coal ember - orange/red. It dropped through the air and then shot up and disappeared.
Big fans of light, which made a circle. There were flashes in the centre of it. Was stationary.
Three very large objects. They were travelling in formation. The distinct formation separated and they headed off South East.
One object, was white and bright. It had a halo above it. Was heading North West.
Large orange, tadpole shaped object with a long tail. Was followed shortly afterwards, by two more similar objects.
Two satellite shaped objects. White and very bright.
One tennis ball sized object. Was round at the front and had a triangular back. Was rainbow coloured and very bright.
Small blobs of rings with a larger ring around them. White and very bright. Stationary.
An alien craft was near to the witness's house. Disc with a beam of light coming from it. Electrical equipment was disturbed.
Bright light travelling across the sky. Was very high and going faster than a jet.
One shooting star, very bright. The movements were slow and then very fast.
A black cylinder. It was moving West and making sharp movements.
Saw an object. It was emitting a bright mauve light.
A large triangular craft hovered over a field. Was very colourful with white and red lights.
Three lights, triangle shaped. There was a static red light. They moved slowly in a straight line.
Small to medium sized object. Pebble shaped. Was black. Was travelling from South to the North.
A white spherical object. Object was seen for about one minute.
One triangular shaped, pulsing white light. Was about twice the size of a star. Object was stationary.
A hovering, orange light that was low in the sky. It turned white.
Round, red, glowing ball, which changed colour as it slowed down. A second object then appeared.
Sixty - eighty jelly fish shaped objects that were white. There was also one single, pulsating red light amongst them.
One large, disc shaped object. Black in colour. It then changed to oval shape. The object was moving fast to the West.
One object, four times the size of a star. Round in shape. Bright light that was yellow/white. Moved North.
A UFO was floating high up in the sky over Sutton Park.
One dome shaped object. Very dark. Was directly above and moving slowly.
One object. Had a bright light too. Was moving from West to East.
The object was like a star, but was moving.
One object, a circle. Beige in colour. Was flying from North to South West.
One large object, the size of an eagle. It looked like three circles joined together. Was dark brown and black. Quite fast.
One round shaped object. Was silver and reflecting the sun. It was high up and bobbed about.
Eight star sized objects, with lights that were red, white, blue and yellow. Six were following two.
The object was cream coloured. Was travelling at an altitude of about 8,000 feet.
One spherical shaped object. Was orange and yellow. Was stationary for a short amount of time.
A UFO was flying North East.
A sequence of bright lights. Were moving from right to left, then back in a random fashion.
Kite shaped object. Black in colour. Headed West and often changed it's speed.
One, small, balloon shaped object. Brown in colour. Was moving up and down and sideways.
A dark, possibly circular object, as it looked like a rocket at first glance. Part of the object was metallic and glistened.
One circular object with flashing bright lights. Was at a high altitude.
One dome/bell shaped object. It had two red lights either side. Other colours were seen on and off. Stationary.
One circular object, orangey/red. Was very bright. Was moving in a regular figure of eight pattern.
One oval shaped object. It had rotating lights. Was moving to the West.
One, silver, fountain pen shaped object, described as an aircraft without wings.
Two large, shining golf ball like objects. They were moving in and out of the clouds.
One large, circular object and a number of small fragments, size of 10p pieces. White and a glow of red and blue. Very bright.
Strange formation of lights flying overhead.
Big bright, white light. A smaller white light was then moving towards and away from the bigger white light.
Several objects. Different colours - purple, green and white. Very bright. Moving very fast to the South.
Two, 18 inch across, round shaped, spinning objects. White and very bright.
The witness saw something that they could not identify, but it was not a plane.
Two, stationary cone shaped objects. One below each other. They were extremely bright.
Bright round light that moved in steps. It reduced in size, and then when smaller, shot off to the left and disappeared.
One, size unknown. Circular ring, horizontal with tail, hanging below with a black ball at the bottom.
One large, round shaped object. White and very bright. Moved fast upwards in the sky.
The object looked like a circle within a circle.
A red flash fell from the sky. It was falling to the ground in a wide spiral.
One large, square - grid like object. Grey and orange and very bright. Was static and then moved North.
One 15 inch across, circular shaped object. Metallic grey. The witness got up close and touched it.
Four cone shaped objects, which were brightly lit. They were in a line, and moving North East.
In between two to three stars, there was a something/star which exploded in to a large mass.
Eight to nine smokeless flares. Two were falling - parallel.
Circular object with a depression in the middle. Was a grey/metallic colour. Very bright. It was emitting smoke.
One large, white, circular light, moving at high speed with no sound, at about 500 feet.
One object that looked a bit like an inverted U. Moving due West.
One rectangular/triangle shaped object. It had a white light that was pulsating. Was of average brightness. Moving North East.
A twinkling object in the air, in close proximity to a plane.
Red ball of fire. It was low on the horizon and was moving to the East.
Half a mile long object, very bright. It was slow and moving in anti-clockwise circles.
The object was very large and about the size of a helicopter, which made no sound. Two consecutive nights
The object was very large and about the size of a helicopter, which made no sound. Two consecutive nights
A very large, round object, followed by another object, which was green and conical in shape. Both were travelling fast.
One white/very bright object. Moving vertically, then remained stationary, with occasional bursts of light. Seen for over an hour.
One mushroom/lampshade shaped object, about six-eight feet. Was white with a very bright base. Very fast.
There was a light through the witness's window, which seemed to be quite a distance away, and moving slowly.
The ship/craft moved towards Ashford and then hovered over Ashford for some time. The craft was solid.
One triangular shaped object. The size of a 747, maybe bigger. It moved N-Easterly, then became stationary.
Exactly fifty objects, that looked like points of light. Very bright. They were in line formation, and moving from East to West.
A spaceship was seen that had lights on the top and bottom of it.
Mentioned that the planets are in danger from different things going on in our solar system.
The object was larger than Venus but smaller than the moon. Was very white. Was wiggling from side to side.
A silent helicopter (resembling a sea stallion), shone a light on the witness. There was a low humming noise.
Bright white light with an orange light at the rear.
Well defined blue object, which was fat at both ends, but slim in the middle.
A vast number of lights flashing in the sky. The lights then became still.
Three to four objects that were smaller than a large aircraft. Were triangular in shape, white and very bright.
The object looked like half of a saucer, had red and green lights, but mostly white. Also appeared to have rings round it.
One triangular object with lights.
One red object sighted by the Captain in flight.
Tennis ball size and shape, with an orange centre and a black inner line around the circle. Two bright green flare trails from the rear.
Small star shaped object.
One large torpedo shaped object with red and white lights. There were bright lights at the front, and also amber flashing lights.
One roundish shaped object that was glowing white and red.
One silver object, long cylinder hanging from a parachute or balloon, drifting SE. It was very big and very high.
Strange lights in the sky, moving very erratically - quick dart like movements - moves then stops before moving off again.
One object the size of a small room. Was spinning on it's own axis.
An assortment of flashing lights.
Triangular shaped object that was multi coloured and had lights on the sides and points of the shape.
Three lights together, that looked like an elongated triangle. The lights were very bright.
Two grey plumes of smoke in the sky over Stockport Railway Station. A grey triangle was then witnessed.
Red light moving fast, high up in the sky. It slowed down, got fast again and then wobbled from side to side.
The object looked like a rounded triangle, longer at one point, with a giant light in the centre.
Unusual aerial phenomenon.
Two round, thirty foot objects. Each had one white light on the left, and one red light on the right. Was a low rumbling sound.
Looked like a bright orange tear drop shaped object, that appeared to have lightning coming from its sides.
A bright light that was covered in black spots.
One opal shaped object with lights, that were orange, red, blue and white. Was very bright.
Object was travelling from East to West.
One object, the shape of a star. Triangular red lights. There were also yellow and blue rays. Was hovering. Pulsated and then vanished.
A bright, green light was moving at very high speed. The object appeared to land near Kegworth over the M1
Silver ball, really bright. Was lower than an aircraft and moving in a straight line. (Message taken 17 Feb 2001).
A glowing white light that was flashing.
Green, circular object, that was hovering in its position.
White and red flashing lights, looked like they were zig-zagging, then they came to a stop. Hovered, then moved away.
One spherically shaped object, that was white and very bright. The object moved at speed in a straight line, then disappeared.
Eight to nine lights that looked like they were close and then they separated. Not too bright. Were like large fireworks.
Four small bright, white lights that looked like headlamps.
Three triangle shaped object. Looked like the Mitsubishi car sign. Middle triangle was brighter than the other two.
One globe with attachment that was white and very bright.
Twenty silver balls with an orange tinge were seen flying West of Enfield Wash.
White lights.
A silver object was seen, that appeared to be flying quite low. It was followed by two aeroplanes, with streams of light behind them.
Very odd flashing light on a moving object, spinning above London, in the Westminster area.
One oval disc seen, with green and red flashing lights.
One object, a white ball which flashed and became very bright.
One quite bright, semi circle object seen, moving across the sky in a straight line.
One large and three smaller triangular objects seen, with bright red and blue flashing lights.
The witness just said it was a UFO.
Was a flying triangle - 100ft from the base of the triangle to the apex. Had red lights on the right and blue lights on the left.
Six round shimmery spheres were seen racing across the night sky.
Large, numerous lights were seen that were white and very bright. They were wheel shaped.
Large triangle shaped object - large white light on front, on each 'tip' - a white light and in the centre, a group of four static red lights.
Two semi circular, elliptical shapes dully illuminated yellow and white. There was a faint murmur.
A saucer shaped object with a white tail. Was the brightest thing the witness had ever seen.
The object appeared larger than a star and was circular. It then turned and looked diamond shape. Had a blue light at the top.
One bright orange/red cigar shaped object that was seen over the sea.
Two lights were circling around each other. They were yellow, red, green and blue in colour.
One cylindrical, upright object that was grey and had light grey stripes.
One round object with red and green flashing lights. Bobbing from side to side.
The witness saw a blue light, then yellow shooting stars, followed by a loud bang.
One small disc shaped object with red and green flashing lights.
One large, round, very bright green object going very fast to the East.
Three silver triangular objects in a triangle formation. Was closely followed by a Police helicopter.
One big, round, bright star - object that was coloured yellow and red. Moved upwards.
One very big circular object, that was white and very bright.
One object with red and green flashing lights.
An object was seen floating up and down and the sun was shining off of it. Also, there were two black dots moving quickly.
One object that was white and very bright. It was moving vertical, very fast.
Object with two white lights on the front, a flashing blue light on one side and a purple one on the other.
Sausage shape object, that was twenty times larger than a normal aircraft. Had different colours.
Two very large disc type aircraft, that were white and had a dull glow.
One large object/aircraft that had a bright white light. Was moving from West to East.
Six objects were seen omitting a bright, white light. They travelled at a slow, steady speed.
One flashing object that had blue, green, yellow and red lighting.
The object was an oval shape. Was light, almost white in colour. Looked like it was rolling through the sky. It was rotating.
One pin point object seen that was very bright and was metallic that was reflecting the sunlight. Left a vapour trail behind.
Saw a bright red light. It vanished after five minutes.
The witness said it looked like there were Harriers following moving lights, over the village after dusk.
Lights circling and then reversing direction every few minutes.
One purple and white pulsating jelly fish like object, with smaller light circles surrounding it. A smaller hazy object was attached.
Three balls of light, stuck together. They were red, blue, yellow and white. Very still and very bright.
Glowing orange boomerang shaped object. Was moving very fast.
Big flying object, looked like a glider, but when viewed on the camcorder, looked like a big horse tumbling around.
Series of neon lights (between neon and gold) in two lines - objects were boomerang shaped, in a V formation.
Green light coming down from the sky, had never seen anything like it before.
Small torpedo shaped object with a white or silver triangular reflector to one side.
Aerial lights seen in the sky.
Aerial lights seen in the sky.
Anomalous aerial lights were seen.
Anomalous aerial lights were seen.
Strange red and white lights seen through curtains. Then there was a solid red beam outside the window for about five to ten seconds.
